name: Pentagram
about_us:
Our work encompasses graphics and identity, architecture and interiors, products and packaging, exhibitions and installations, websites and digital experiences, advertising and communications. Our 24 partners are all practicing designers, and whether they are working collaboratively or independently, they always do so in friendship.

Our structure is unique. We are the only major design studio where the owners of the business are the creators of the work and serve as the primary contact for every client. This reflects our conviction that great design cannot happen without passion, intelligence and — above all — personal commitment, and is demonstrated by a portfolio that spans five decades and all industries.

name: Excited!
about_us: Product Design Agency. We are an award-winning design agency (Red Dot Awards, CSS Design Awards, Awwwards) from Lviv.  We create experiences and design user interfaces for all kinds of devices: Web, Desktop, Mobile, and SaaS.

name: NetBramha - Global UX Design Studio
about_us:
NetBramha is an award-winning full-service experience (UI/UX) Strategy and Design studio with a passion for creating delightful products & platforms. Being India’s oldest UX studio the challenge and joy of making an impact with design over the 16 years have been phenomenal. We have done this over & over again for several Fortune 500 companies as well as startups (some of them are unicorns today!) & we thoroughly enjoy the process.
 
Never shy of experimenting. 

With our Strategy + Design practice, we have impacted 1 Billion+ users across 250+ clients in 20+ countries. We believe we are on the cusp of a design revolution as the need for design thinking is more than ever. 

Few key highlights

- Championing the cause of design-led transformation of products & companies
- Worked with all the Billion Dollar startups in India (InMobi, Eka, Sprinklr, BYJU's) along with industry giants such as Reliance, EMAAR, & many more across India & the globe
- Experience & expertise across 30-odd domains (from Fintech to Life Sciences)
- Design capability across IOT, Service Design, Mobile, Web, etc.
- Founded a not-for-profit design community called DesignDay
- Won the Red Dot Design Award for disruptive maternal healthcare app 
- Won multiple Design Awards including Kyoorius Creative & Design Awards for innovative Agritech App 

We have immense respect for people who love design, food & adventure. Yes in that exact order! 😀  

Our dream & vision is to create impact & design at scale. And positively impact 100% of the global population with our superpower of Design & Design Thinking.
service_2: user experience for mobile & web apps

name: SEEN Group
about_us:
SEEN Group is a globally famed beauty specialist business. An industry-leading collective of beauty experts with specialist products & services powered by proprietary technology.

Creative strategy, integrated marketing communications, audience first brand experience and culturally connected social commerce.

Deep knowledge. Courageous thinking. Brilliant ideas.

SEEN Group is comprised of four key divisions:

Beauty SEEN:  Connecting brands with consumers via an expert understanding of the ‘who’, the ‘how’ and the 'why'.

Community X SEEN:  A full funnel influencer marketing team with an extensive network of influential relationships and a proprietary nano & micro creator platform, CXS.

SEEN BX: Beauty industry-defining experiences and events

SEEN Works:  Specialist thought leadership meets industry leading creative execution.

name: BOMBAYDC
about_us:
BombayDC is an award-winning design and technology company headquartered in Mumbai that builds best-in-class class digital products for India’s Fortune 500 companies and startups.

New biz: sid@bombaydc.com
Careers: work@bombaydc.com
Media Relations: neha@bombaydc.com
Website: www.bombaydc.com

Bombay DC has launched mobile apps, websites and other digital experiences for clients including Kotak Mahindra Bank, NPCI, Godrej Enterprises Group, Aditya Birla Group, Tata, BITS Pilani, Kokuyo Camlin, Blue Star, Coca-Cola, Bandhan Bank, AU Bank, Trifecta Capital. Its founding differentiation lies in its people with global experience across Europe, Japan and the US and a deep understanding of the fabric of India.

Its behaviour design, product design, and engineering methods have delivered outstanding outcomes to its clients. Bombay DC’s subsidiary Branded offers brand consulting services to select clients. Its evolution in the last 10 years is driven by the gap it found in the market, there was no company offering everything needed to build world-class digital products in India. Started as a digital design company in 2015, added engineering capabilities in 2018, product management in 2021, behaviour science in 2022 and AI in 2023. It believes that top-quality products can be built at speed only when these functions are deeply in sync and under one control.

This DNA is hard to replicate for any of its competitors as it takes years to build. It’s now home to 80+ designers, behavioural scientists, and engineers in India, as well as global partners.

name: BUILDHOLLYWOOD
about_us:
BUILDHOLLYWOOD celebrates our magical cities, brimming with all sorts of people, lifestyles and culture. By developing street-level poster space in carefully curated locations across the UK, we place creativity in the heart of our cities.

Built on an art school mentality that stretches back decades to our founder, we have a talented family of agencies – DIABOLICAL, JACK and JACK ARTS – who specialise in their own sectors to produce street-level poster campaigns, creative billboards, hand-painted murals, interactive installations, ambient activities, and unique experiential campaigns, creating authentic interactions with people on the street.

This combination of format, creativity and position is unique to BUILDHOLLYWOOD. It’s the reason why we work and collaborate with the most exciting brands, artists and creative institutions in the world. BUILDHOLLYWOOD are the creative street advertising specialists.

name: Uncommon Creative Studio
about_us: Uncommon is a global creative studio based in New York, London & Stockholm, building brands that people in the real world actually wish existed.

name: Splendid Communications
about_us:
Splendid: Brand Stories for the Real World

It used to be that a loud voice and a decent ad spend was all you needed to get your message across. In today’s fragmented world the only way to project a consistent message is with brand stories strong enough to remain intact wherever they are told and shared. At Splendid we call our approach People-First Creativity. From our strategic thinking, to the way we generate ideas, to the way we work with our clients, our starting point is real people living real lives in the real world. Brief us and we’ll challenge you, we’ll urge you to keep it real and we’ll collaborate as if we’re an extension of your team. We’re here to deliver creative work that lives beyond the industry bubble. We love what we do. We’re Splendid.

name: St Marks Studios
about_us:
St Marks Studios is brand experience agency specialising in COOH, experiential, special builds and retail activations for consumer brands.

We’re an ideas agency – dreaming up ever innovative ways to engage customers and drive brand fame.

We’re here to bring wild and wonderful ideas to life.

Our team have expertise in an array of specialist mediums ranging from projections to flyposting and impactful murals.

We’re pioneering a new style of brand experience with eye-catching, innovative and non-traditional media solutions.

In a digital world dominated by algorithms and social media saturation – live activations and real experiences that lean into human connection are becoming more resonant.

With a focus on creativity and interactivity, we strive to captivate hearts and minds through unforgettable, shareable campaigns – using the latest tech.

From shopping centre installations to in-store theatre, influencer events and sampling – we can get thousands of potential customers hands-on with the product.

Our goal is to not only captivate audiences and deliver fame at scale but to cultivate lasting relationships between brands and consumers.

Please don’t hesitate to get in touch - info@stmarksstudios.com

name: Mother Design
about_us:
We have a diverse portfolio of work and family of clients, brought together by a shared desire to make the best work we possibly can. 

For us, ‘best’ isn’t just about making stuff look nice, but instead design that helps to solve problems, tell a story, impact culture and drive progress within our industry and our client’s. 

So working across sectors, with clients big and small, we help brands to be at their ‘best’;  establishing their enduring foundations, and bringing them to life in a way people can see, hear and feel (through branding, experiences, spaces and product).

name: Publicis Groupe
about_us:
Founded in 1926 by Marcel Bleustein-Blanchet, today Publicis Groupe is the second largest communications group in the world and a leader in marketing, communication, and digital business transformation, led by Arthur Sadoun, the third CEO in its history.
 
Publicis Groupe is positioned at every step of the value chain, from consulting to execution, combining marketing transformation and digital business transformation. Publicis Groupe is a privileged partner in its clients’ transformation to enhance personalisation at scale. The Groupe relies on ten expertise concentrated within four main activities: Communication, Media, Data and Technology. Through a unified and fluid organisation, its clients have a facilitated access to all its expertise in every market. Present in over 100 countries, Publicis Groupe employs around 103,000 professionals.

name: Ofspace – Product Design for Scalable Startups
about_us:
You’ve got traction. Users are signing up. But the UX? Still feels off.

That’s where Ofspace comes in.

We partner with fast-moving SaaS and AI startups to fix the design problems that slow growth, hurt conversions, and frustrate users.

This isn’t about making things pretty—it’s about making them work.
From onboarding drop-offs to clunky flows, we redesign the experience around what actually drives retention, activation, and scale.

Whether you're just post-MVP or gearing up for Series A, we help you:

- Pinpoint friction
- Reduce churn
- Ship a UX that feels as good as your product sounds

Fast, lean, and strategy-first.

Want quick wins?
Drop your link—we’ll share a few free, actionable UX fixes.

name: b. the communications agency

b. the communications agency is a creative communications consultancy for leading, pioneering, and next generation brands.

Born boutique in 2004, today we offer big picture thinking with the same energy, honesty, and attention to detail, using our global network, industry intelligence, experience, and data to help our clients navigate shifting trends. We believe in the power of brand, delivering beyond the boundaries of traditional PR to drive credible multi-channel impact and positive cultural & behavioural influence.

Our expert sectors include beauty, fashion, lifestyle, health & wellbeing, and food & beverage, representing a diverse portfolio of retail icons, direct-to-consumer pioneers, and emerging social-first disruptor brands.
Established since 2015, in response to demand for sector-specialism, we work alongside and in collaboration with our standalone sister agencies to ensure insight, expertise, and integrated impact.

Summer. is a leading global influencer marketing agency. Our work fosters genuine connections between content creators, talent, and brands to create vibrant and memorable collaborations that nurture and drive measurable growth.

BEING. is a social-first creative studio. We are a strategic and creative partner, helping brands identify the channels, disciplines, and content formats to connect and engage with the audiences that matter, in the all the right places.

For more details on our services please contact hello@b-theagency.com

about_us:
Adfactors PR, founded in 1997, is India's largest Public Relations firm. A multi-specialist, full-service firm, we serve clients in over 25 industries across 40 cities in India. We have a track-record of successfully delivering on complex and challenging PR briefs – often characterised by high stakes, urgency and a sense of uncertainty about the potential outcomes.

In 2020, PRovoke Media named Adfactors PR as one of the three PR Agency of the Decade in Asia-Pac and one of the seven Agency of the Decade globally. Adfactors PR is a member of PROI Worldwide, the largest global partnership of independent public relations firms.

name: Kin&Co
about_us:
Kin&Co: The Culture Consultancy That Delivers Real Results

At Kin&Co, we don’t just talk about culture—we transform it. We help businesses build high-performing, purpose-driven workplaces where people thrive, innovation flourishes, and results speak for themselves.

What We Stand For
Work should work for everyone—your business, your employees, and the world. As a B Corp-certified culture consultancy, we’re committed to sustainability, diversity, and inclusion, helping organisations create resilient, people-first cultures that drive growth, retention, and long-term success.

Why Businesses Trust Us
We take a science-backed, disruptive, and results-driven approach to culture change. From FTSE 100 giants to high-growth start-ups, we’ve worked with industry leaders like BT, Grant Thornton, and LifeArc.

How We Make an Impact
Culture Transformation: Create a high-performing, values-driven culture that drives success.

Leadership Development: Empower leaders to inspire, engage, and lead with purpose.

Purpose Activation: Define and embed your organisation’s “why” to create lasting impact.

Why Choose Kin&Co?
We don’t do cookie-cutter solutions. We dig deep, challenge the status quo, and design culture strategies that stick. Our team of experts brings the energy, empathy, and expertise needed to tackle complex challenges—helping businesses unlock their full potential.

Looking for a culture that works? Let’s build it—together.

name: Taylor Herring | We Make Brands Famous
about_us:
We're the most awarded agency in the UK winning more PR Week Awards in the last decade than any other agency (fun fact: 26).

We've been named PR Week's 'Agency Of The Year' four times in the last 8 years and Campaign's Agency Of The Year twice in the past three years.

In any market, ‘top-of-mind’ awareness is critical: to be the first brand that comes to mind. 

Being the most talked-about brand in your category gives you a competitive advantage.

To be the most talked-about you need to fuel conversations with compelling stories that will hit the nation’s news feeds.

Stories that are powered by engaging brand activations, entertaining multi-media content and creator collaborations that spread the message across WhatsApp groups and social channels 

That’s what we do.

name: Interbrand
about_us:
Interbrand has been a world leading brand consultancy for 50 years – having pioneered iconic work and forged many of the brand building tools that are commonplace across the industry today.

We know that in an age of unprecedented abundance of choice and speed of innovation, customers’ expectations are moving faster than business. While incremental change is still essential, it is no longer sufficient. It takes bold moves to leap ahead of customers and competitors. We call these moves Iconic Moves.

In collaboration with the world’s leading brands, our global team of thinkers and makers are pioneering the future of brand building. By turning customers into active participants, we help our clients strengthen their brands on an ongoing basis – our approach gives them confidence to make Iconic Moves that spark desire and create utility, driving extraordinary results.

Interbrand is a part of Omnicom Group (NYSE:OMC).

name: Leo Burnett UK
about_us:
We are a global creative agency with offices in over 100 Countries around the world. 

Unlike some agencies that have different divisions to service advertising, digital, social and experiential, in our agency, there are no walls between disciplines to get in the way of the best solution for our clients. 

Our clients brief us on the problem they need solved, and we come at the problem in a holistic way. It’s this approach that enables us to create truly innovative ideas that go beyond campaigns and defy norms of what an agency can do to move sales. It’s a way of working that’s delivered award-winning work, and exceptional ROI for our clients.

We work with a diverse range of brands. Brands that are part of everyone’s everyday life – such as McDonald’s, Kelloggs, Iceland, Butlins, Coca-Cola, Betfair, Proctor & Gamble, Samsung, The NSPCC and more… 

We have a really strong culture and people often comment on our genuinely friendly and informal style. This, combined with a real passion for great ideas, makes Leo Burnett a great place to work.

name: Design Milk
about_us: Design Milk is a leader in the modern design, digital media, interior and architectural trade, and consumer industries. We support the world’s best independent brands, emerging designers, destinations, design events, and products through exceptional, award-winning content across the worlds of art, architecture, interior design, furniture, fashion, and technology.

name: Freuds Group
about_us:
Freuds is an agency on a mission. It’s been part of our DNA for 35 years, from Live Aid and Comic Relief to Make Poverty History, Live 8 and the Global Goals.
Today, with change all around us, and more change desperately needed, people, organisations, businesses and brands face increasingly complex challenges at an accelerated pace.
These challenges present threats and opportunities that are often hard to distinguish from each other, with a vanishingly thin margin for error.
To navigate the current climate takes agility, and expertise. Couple this with passion, and you can connect the dots in ways others can’t. That’s what we do. That’s what we call Love & Work.

Love & Work. Together. For good.

www.freuds.com

name: Think Design Collaborative
about_us:
We work with visionary organizations and transform the way we live, work, and interact. 

Since 2004, we have been powering mission critical initiatives of some of the most renowned organizations and brands, transforming businesses across industries and impacting millions of users through our methods.

Through our studios spread across the world; and a vibrant ecosystem of clients, partners and leadership at each of our studios, we deliver design that is meaningful and impactful. With capabilities spanning UI UX Design, User Research, CX and Data, we work closely with top leadership and foundational teams to identify elements that constitute success, propose solutions and help build them. Through our methodologies we built over years of practice, we bring a unique combination of Strategic, Creative and Technical expertise that is of immediate value to the people we work with. 

As a company founded by designers, everything we do is driven by thought leadership and acquired sensibilities. Our relationship with our clients and lineup of awards are a testimony to our capabilities and our commitment to good design.

We are Think Design, part of the HavasCX network.

name: Milk & Honey PR | Certified B Corp
about_us:
B Corp Honoree
PRovoke Best Agency to Work For '20 '21 '22 & '23
Investors in People, Employer of the Year 2020
PRCA Diversity Champ


What we do

The buzz of something new

Milk & Honey PR is an energetic London, Munich, Amsterdam, New York and Singapore based PR agency. Managing and nurturing reputations for ambitious growth companies.

We work with senior decision makers to change the way businesses talk. We don’t start with numbers, we start with people. We specialise in enriching messaging. Making your story more beautiful, colourful, inspiring or simply less complicated.

We weave these rich, emotive messages into intelligent campaigns that deliver business value.

Who we are

A hive of passionate storytellers and strategists

We are intelligent, committed and passionate communicators and strategists. We are proud to be employee owned, which is key to our shared success.

We obsess about getting the message right. Injecting warmth and passion into corporate storytelling. So, we work a little differently. We look at campaign outcomes not hours. Ensuring our creative ideas and strategic solutions deliver on the bottom line.

Human relations

We are an agency where people come first. Where passion and creativity are prized. Where clients are celebrated. One where there is time to think, to go the extra mile. A land of opportunity.

What we stand for

Beeline for growth

Here at Milk & Honey PR we live and breathe our brand values. We are obsessed with delivering campaigns our clients will love. We will never compromise on our attention to detail, focused campaign design or our passion in delivery. We are focused on developing and investing in our talented team and infrastructure for growth.

Purpose and profit

At the core of our business are our values of energy, bravery, respect, passion, collaboration and loyalty. We work hard to make sure that what we do is right. Not just for us, but the people we work with and the communities around us.

name: Accordience Group
about_us:
Accordience is a distinctive communications group that combines best-in-class, specialist consultancy with the scale to operate at pace both globally & locally.  

We help brands and businesses reach and influence audiences that matter.
 
 We believe in the power of communication and agile collaboration to create opportunity and positive change for our clients and our people.

name: Enigma - Digital Product Design, UI UX & Neuromarketing Agency
about_us:
Enigma is a collective of CREATORS, DISCOVERERS, DREAMERS & DOERS. We create Digital Brand Experiences for the web of tomorrow!


In the age of consumer promiscuity, brands need to attract, connect & engage with their audiences at an unprecedented level. Interpreting how these connections can be made and communicated with relevance to the users creates a powerful drive that transforms the way people think, feel, and behave towards a brand and, ultimately, the experience they have with it. We leverage the power of Design, Consumer Psychology & Technology to engineer growth-oriented solutions & experiences that propel your success in the Enigmatic realm of bits & bytes.

Armed to the teeth with the best artists, technologists, marketects, strategists, data junkies and writers, we pride ourselves in modelling big, beautiful & audacious digital experiences & solutions for our brand partners. At Enigma Digital, we are charting the unknown territory and mapping the digital future for visionaries who lead meaningful brands.


Want to collaborate and build something great together? Write to us at - hi@weareenigma.com

name: frog
about_us:
frog is the reinvention and experience partner for the eco-digital era. Together with our clients, we innovate with purpose, using strategy, creativity, tech, data and AI to advance people and planet.  

We are dreamers and doers who are relentless about challenging the status quo to win hearts and move markets. As part of Capgemini Invent, we bring diverse skillsets to unleash growth, build superior experiences and create lasting impact at scale—fusing art and science to realize the future.

Learn more: www.frog.co

name: IDEO
about_us: IDEO (pronounced “EYE-dee-oh”) is a global design consultancy helping the world’s most audacious dreamers create braver tomorrows. We activate our science of design with the alchemy of our wide-eyed and wonderful creative people to make futures you can click, feel, taste, test, and believe in. Our early days were filled with designing groundbreaking physical products, but 40 years in, you’ll find that we’ve been busy working on the future of almost everything, from sustainable supply chains with H&M to design-oriented organizations with Ford, entire civic infrastructures with Intercorp—and so much more.

name: TopUX
about_us:
TopUX is a UI/UX Design Agency headquartered in Southfield, Michigan 🇺🇸 founded as a partnership between Spaceberry Studio and LeverageIT. 

We are not just a UI/UX Design Agency; we're your trusted partner in achieving unparalleled digital excellence.

With a passion for innovative design, a dedicated team of seasoned experts, and a focus solely on UI/UX Design, we're here to redefine your digital presence. Our mission is clear: to empower businesses worldwide with exceptional user experiences, paving the way for their digital success.

Partner with us and discover a world where design meets purpose. Our collaborative approach, creative spirit, and unwavering commitment to user-centered design set us apart.

Let's create something great together - hello@topux.co 📨

name: Musemind - Global UX Design Agency
about_us:
Musemind: Crafting Digital Experiences That Connect and Transform

With a global footprint in Dubai, Berlin, Riyadh, Dhaka, London, and New York, Musemind is more than a Web and UX Design Agency. We’re a collective of 60 passionate designers, animators, researchers, and strategists, all driven by a shared purpose: to build designs that don’t just look good but truly resonate with users and transform brands.

Our work speaks for itself. Trusted by over 300 clients, from innovative startups raising millions to established Fortune 100 companies like Microsoft, Salesforce, Indeed, Panther, Motley Fool, and Peel, we’ve been privileged to design for businesses across diverse industries. Whether it’s E-commerce, Metaverse, Tourism, AR/VR, Ed-tech, Healthcare, Beauty, or Agriculture, our cross-industry insights empower us to bring real solutions that elevate and differentiate.

We offer an all-inclusive range of UX/UI services—design, consulting, audits, prototyping, redesign, SaaS, MVP development, and branding—ensuring we’re your one-stop shop for everything UX. Our team doesn’t just design for today; we strategize, innovate, and future-proof experiences so our clients can thrive in an ever-evolving digital world.

Let’s create something remarkable together.

Reach out to us at hello@musemind.agency, and let’s bring your vision to life.

name: Monsoonfish Inc. UX & UI Design agency
about_us:
Monsoonfish is an Apps & Interactions Development company with the design edge. There are millions of apps around & countless websites and we believe that only great (not just good) design can make your app or website stand out, be downloaded and more importantly used. We make interactions that engage, connect, entertain, educate, inform the consumer and provide long-term value to our brand customer.

We have been working in product strategy, Design, UX and UI for more than 14 years now with an energetic team of 40+ designers. We’ve worked on various mobile applications, web applications, software, applications, websites across domains like Healthcare, ERPs, HRMS, Learning & Education, Automotive, and many more where we've added value in terms of user relevant product featuring, easy to use user experience (UX) design and stunning looking graphic (UI) design.

name: Weber Shandwick
about_us:
Weber Shandwick is the earned-first global communications agency. Led by world-class strategic and creative thinkers and activators, Weber Shandwick has won some of the most prestigious awards in the industry, including being named #1 in the Public Relations and Brand Strategies category on Fast Company’s 2024 Most Innovative Companies list, one of Fast Company’s Best Workplace for Innovators in 2023, PRWeek’s 2024 Global Agency of the Year, ranked #1 on PRovoke’s Global Creative Index in 2024 and honored on Ad Age’s A-List in 2024 & 2020 and Best Places to Work in 2019, in addition to being awarded Campaign Global’s PR Agency of the Year in 2023. Weber Shandwick was the most awarded PR agency at the 2023 and 2024 Cannes Lions International Festival of Creativity, including earning the PR industry’s first-ever idea-led Cannes Grand Prix in the Brand Experience & Activation category and cumulatively earning more than 225 Cannes Lions. Weber Shandwick has also been named PR Agency of the Year by Campaign US in 2021, honored as PRovoke’s Global Agency of the Decade in 2020 and ranked #1 on PRovoke’s Global Creative Index in 2021 and 2022. Additionally, the firm was named PRWeek’s Global Agency of the Year in 2015, 2016, 2017 and 2018 and was awarded PRWeek’s Purpose Agency of the Year in 2020 and 2021. Weber Shandwick also received Honorable Mention on the Gartner Magic Quadrant for Global Marketing Agencies in 2021, as the only PR agency featured. 

Part of the Interpublic Group (NYSE: IPG), Weber Shandwick is the anchor agency within The Weber Shandwick Collective – the strategic communications and consulting network. For more information, visit https://www.webershandwick.com/. 

Social Media Community Guidelines: http://bit.ly/wssocialterms

name: BCW Global
about_us: BCW is the global communications agency built to move people. BCW partners with clients in the B2B, consumer, corporate, crisis management, healthcare, public affairs, purpose and technology sectors to set strategic direction for all communications and create powerful and unexpected ideas that earn attention. Through an “earned-plus” offer – earned media plus paid media, creative technology, data, AI and an expanding suite of innovative capabilities – BCW moves people with power and precision to move its clients forward. BCW is a part of WPP (NYSE: WPP), a creative transformation company.

name: Accenture
about_us:
Accenture is a leading global professional services company that helps the world’s leading businesses, governments and other organizations build their digital core, optimize their operations, accelerate revenue growth and enhance citizen services—creating tangible value at speed and scale.
 
We are a talent and innovation-led company serving clients in more than 120 countries. We combine our strength in technology and leadership in cloud, data and AI with unmatched industry experience, functional expertise and global delivery capability. We measure our success by the 360° value we create for our clients, each other, our shareholders, partners and communities.

This LinkedIn company page is moderated. When engaging with Accenture, we encourage everyone to:

- Use common courtesy and be respectful of others.
- Create your own original content and avoid content that you know to be fraudulent.
- Never repost someone else's copyrighted work, unless you have permission.
- Never post personal, identifying, or confidential information.

We reserve the right to delete comments or posts we deem to be:

- Profane, obscene, inappropriate, offensive, abusive material.
- Spam, repeated comments and commercial messages and personal advertisements.
- Discriminatory or that contain hateful speech of any kind regarding age, gender, race, religion, nationality, sexual orientation, gender identity or disability.
- Threats; personal attacks; abusive, defamatory, derogatory, or inflammatory language; or stalking or harassment of any individual, entity or organization.
- False, inaccurate, libelous, or otherwise misleading in any way.

name: Radley Yeldar
about_us:
Radley Yeldar is an award-winning, independent London and Birmingham-based creative consultancy with more than 200 communications specialists.

We’ve been working with organisations of all shapes and sizes for over 30 years to help create a world that believes in business.

How do we do this? By combining a powerful mix of strategic and communication services including: brand positioning; purpose, vision and values; visual identity; employee engagement; customer experience; sustainability expertise; corporate reporting - and much, much more. By blending deep insight with cutting-edge creative film and animation, experiential experiences, print and digital content, our campaigns drive multi-channel, multi-audience engagement with real impact.

name: Frank
about_us:
Frank is a creative agency that helps brands lead, drive and own conversations.
 
We create insight-led campaigns that generate buzz, kick-start a reaction and make a real difference. Offline, online, digital, social, influencers, paid, owned, earned, shared - or whatever the buzzwords of the moment are - we believe great ideas are at the heart of it all, and are, by their very nature, channel-neutral.
 
Great ideas get people talking. We’ve developed a detailed approach and methodology to help engineer this. We call it Talkability® and it’s at the core of everything we do. And we believe in it so much, it’s been a registered trademark of Frank since the day we started. Which explains that little ®.

name: Pineapple Design
about_us:
At Pineapple, we believe great brands and digital products are built when businesses build with clarity, depth, and purpose.

We partner long-term with startups, enterprises, and product-led teams, helping them design and build thoughtful digital products, brand experiences, and CX (customer journeys).

Some of our partners are:

- Cipla, IDFC FIRST Bank, Tata Neu, Vodafone Idea, Upstox, L&T Finance, Eppo, Outcomes AI, Ninjacart, BriskPe + many others.

Our work spans brand design, UX, UI, and digital CX. This is where every design decision ties back to real user needs and business priorities.

Our approach is simple:

- Understand the business with clarity
- Understand the user’s psychology deeply
- Leverage design and technology to connect the two thoughtfully

Our belief is in structure, relevance, and craft.

Whether it’s a product interface, a brand strategy, or a full customer journey, every solution we design is built with context, not assumptions.

We’re not an agency, but a thinking partner who can help decode complex product problems, align teams around users, and design digital experiences

We work with founders, CXOs, CPOs, CMOs, and Chief Digital Officers who are serious about designing better and making every customer interaction a reason to trust, stay, and grow.

If you believe great experiences aren’t built by accident, let’s talk. We’re at hello@pineapple.design

name: Publicis
about_us:
You can either adapt to change, ignore it or lead it. Publicis Worldwide, North America is a full service advertising agency that helps our clients take the lead.

About
Publicis Worldwide, NA is a regional operation of the largest global network within Publicis Groupe. In North America, Publicis Worldwide has offices in Toronto, Montreal, Dallas, Seattle, San Francisco, Indianapolis, Boise, Calgary, Windsor and New York, their largest office in the region with 700+ employees. NA clients include P&G, Citi, T-Mobile, Cadillac, AFLAC, Chrysler (Canada), Wendy's, L'Oreal, Nestle, Home Depot (Canada), Abbott, UBS, West Jet and Pfizer, among others.

Mission
We believe that this era demands a combination of strategic, creative and digital ideas that help clients to Lead The Change in their own digital transformation. 

The one constant in this world is change. You can either adapt to it, ignore it, or lead it. "Lead the Change" is both our mission and our call to action. It speaks to our entrepreneurial spirit and our roots as an agency. It defines the way we think about brands, ideas and relationships, and it's alive in our work. Change that helps them to redefine the landscape and forge ahead of the competition. Change that lets them become part of the public consciousness, and create a movement of passionate advocates. 

About Publicis Worldwide
Publicis Worldwide is a global creative agency, with 88 years experience providing change leadership for its clients. With over 12,000 employees in 84 countries, clients include Axa, BNP Paribas, Carrefour, Cartier, Citi, Coca-Cola, Haier, Hilton Honors, HP, l’Oréal, LG, Luxottica, Nestlé, Orange, P&G, Paypal, Pernod Ricard, RATP, Renault, Sanofi, Seb, Siemens, Telefonica, Total, and UBS. Publicis Worldwide is a part of Publicis Groupe.

name: Grayling
about_us:
We are Grayling, the world's local communications agency.

With 32 offices around the world, plus an extensive affiliate network, we get closer to the insights, influencers, cultures and communities to create advantage for our clients.

name: Designerrs | UI UX Design Academy
about_us:
Designerrs Academy provides a safe learning space for designers across the world. We are trying to make design education accessible for everyone by providing learning experiences and training programs for User Experience and User Interface Design, Design Thinking, Interaction Design, Visual Design, Designing for Immersive Experience (VR, AR, XR), Voice UX, and other specializations.

Our learning pedagogy involves Hands-on activities, Live projects, Gamified teaching methods, and curriculums designed by our learning experience design team under the guidance of experts from the industry such as Samsung, Microsoft, Google, Cisco, Byjus, Thoughtworks, and alumni from NIDs and IITs. 

Our 40K + Community consists of students and professionals from various backgrounds such as Product Design, Product Management, Product Marketing, Engineering, Business Management, HR, Sales, Retail who want to move to more creative career paths. With a vision to “Democratise Design Education”, we are focused on creating the Next Million Designers and help them become better problem solvers.

name: Hanbury Strategy
about_us:
Hanbury is a strategic advisory firm that turns insight into impact. Whether you face a communications challenge or have a policy goal, our exceptional team uses our understanding of public opinion, the press and politics to create campaigns that work. 

Since launching in 2016, we have advised some of the most recognised brands and fastest-growing companies in the world on their biggest reputational, policy and regulatory challenges.

name: Cuberium
about_us:
Cuberium is about creating a comprehensive ecosystem for meme tokens. In one place, users can play games with meme tokens, trade them, and monetize their participation in crypto projects.

Cuberium envisions a world where meme tokens, gaming, and trading merge seamlessly. Our platform will be the foundation for developing a thriving crypto community that brings together meme token projects and opens up new avenues for growth for all participants.

The ecosystem is designed to be a one-stop shop for meme token enthusiasts and GameFi aficionados alike.

name: MHP Group
about_us:
MHP Group is the integrated communications agency built for the Networked Age – a world that’s increasingly connected, complex, polarised and activist. We lead the way in the application of behavioural science to solve communications challenges across a range of sectors and disciplines, including health, public affairs, financial services, capital markets, creative and brand and reputation, by creating strategies and multichannel campaigns to engage every audience, from consumer to policy maker, and from stakeholder to shareholder.

MHP Group is the home of four brands, MHP, Mischief and La Plage, with 230 specialists in London and San Francisco. We are trusted by, and proud to partner with, many of the world’s leading businesses and brands, including Sky, Lego, Just Eat, AstraZeneca, E.ON, Women’s Aid and Coinbase.

PRCA Large Consultancy of the Year, 2022.

Follow us on X @mhpgroup_

name: Taylor Bennett Foundation
about_us:
The Taylor Bennett Foundation (TBF) is a UK-based charity that welcomes diverse talent from Black, Asian, and ethnic minority backgrounds from ages 16- 24 to pursue a career in public relations and communications via our six professional development programmes. Established in 2008 by executive search firm Taylor Bennett, Dame Heather McGregor CBE and Brunswick Group, the Taylor Bennett Foundation exists to increase greater ethnic representation across the profession. 

What we do works. The Taylor Bennett Foundation has supported over 850  diverse professionals over the last fifteen years.

With over 210 organisations supporting us, we run six key educational training professional development programmes that provide participants with the knowledge, skill set and network required to pursue and grow a successful career in public relations and communications. 

Our award-winning mentoring, training and internship programmes ensure that whether participants are entering the industry or are looking to move into senior management and leadership opportunities, our commitment to increasing ethnic representation remains at the forefront of our vision, mission and values.

name: Famous Campaigns
about_us:
The best creative work from brands - ads, PR, social, OOH and inspo from around the globe.

Get our famous round-up in your inbox every Friday  ⮕ famouscampaigns.substack.com

Edited by James Herring, co-founder of creative agencies Taylor Herring and St Marks Studios. 

For tips, paid partnerships & collabs  ⮕ news@famouscampaigns.com.

Website ⮕ famouscampaigns.com

name: EXDERA - UI/UX Design & Development Agency
about_us:
At Exdera, we design for business innovations and build with intelligence -strategy led design and tech agency for global businesses.

We have delivered B2B, B2C, SAAS and to various industries and domains like Healthcare, Medtech, IT, ITES, Automobile, Ed-tech, Retail, Hospitality, Fintech, Aerospace, Industrial and Government.

We consult for product and user research, UX design and brand and marketing. Our services span product-market fit consulting, UX design systems, digital transformation strategy, logo design, brand identity and strategy, advanced website design, hi-fidelity prototypes, design mockups, figma designs, wireframes, workflow documentation, business process documentation, product requirement documentation, product design documentation, development handoff documentation and continuous design support.
 
Developing a successful digital product is complex — but choosing the right partner makes all the difference. At Exdera, we bring deep expertise across cutting-edge technology stacks, including MERN stack development, Flutter app development, and frontend frameworks like React.js and Next.js. Our mastery extends to website design and technology architecture, leveraging platforms like Webflow, WordPress, Ghost CMS, and Wix to craft stunning, responsive, and robust digital experiences. Whether you need a custom CMS website, a scalable web application, or a high-performance mobile app, Exdera applies innovative solutions and proven processes to turn your product vision into a reality — building for sustainability, scalability, and long-term impact.
 
We believe that strategy works, when research and execution is right.

So, it doesn't matter, if you are a Zero to One Start-up, Scale-up, or Enterprise. Let's collaborate and get things moving at speed.

Contact
India +91 9008357864
contact@exdera.com

name: How&How
about_us:
How&How is a brand and digital agency liberating ideas the world deserves.

Based in London and Los Angeles we use imagination to turn businesses into brands. Brands which enrich lives, nature and founders.

We are B-Corp Certified, which means our agency meets the highest standards of verified social and environmental performance, public transparency and legal accountability. It’s by nurturing a healthy work culture that we’re able to attract and retain some of the world’s top creative talent. 

Our expertise is in:
— Brand Strategy
— Visual Identity
— Verbal Identity
— Design
— Website Design
— Website Development

name: Marketing Inspiration
about_us:
Inspiring marketing campaigns from all over the world. 

Our goal is to share the best and most inspiring examples of marketing we've seen to provide ideas and inspiration to marketers. 


FEATURE YOUR CAMPAIGN: 💡
If you're interested in showcasing your campaign on our page and reaching more than 100k followers email us. (Subject to approval - we only showcase the best!)

Marketing Inspiration is owned by Honchō. We provide SEO, Content and Digital PR to grow organic channels and Paid Media to instantly gain exposure to the right in-market audience.

name: Edelman
about_us:
Edelman is a global communications firm that partners with businesses and organizations to evolve, promote and protect their brands and reputations. Our 6,000 people in more than 60 offices deliver communications strategies that give our clients the confidence to lead, act with certainty and earn the lasting trust of their stakeholders.

We develop powerful ideas and tell magnetic stories that move at the speed of news, make an immediate impact, transform culture and spark movements. 

Since our founding in 1952 by Dan Edelman, we have remained an independent, family-run company. We use our profits to strengthen our business, provide our employees with opportunities to grow, advance our industry, and serve as a responsible citizen of the world. Every day, we strive to live and work by a long-held set of core values: the pursuit of excellence, the freedom to be curious, the courage to do the right thing, and a commitment to improving society.

Edelman is an equal opportunity employer of all protected classes, including veterans and individuals with disabilities.

name: Given
about_us:
Given is an award-winning consultancy for purpose-driven businesses and brands. We bring together strategic consultancy, true expertise in purpose and sustainability and an in-house creative studio — all under one roof. 

We work for businesses across the world, including IKEA, Lloyds Banking Group, John Lewis Partnership, GBRTT, Hydrogen Group, Kimberly-Clark, L'Oreal, Bupa, PVH, Aviva, Ocado, PVH Group and many others. 

We use co-creation to ensure purpose is inclusive, effective and drives impact at every stage of the process - because it’s always powered by people.  

Our work spans three areas:

We DEFINE your purpose to unite your business and mobilise your people around the positive role you play in the world and the problems you can profitably solve - and we build the plan to make it real.

We EMBED your purpose to drive your decision making and shape your ways of working, making your culture and business practices more purposeful, sustainable and inclusive.

We ACTIVATE your purpose to bring it to life in the world and drive impact and brand equity through communications, campaigns, customer experience, innovation & impact partnerships.

If you're ready to evolve your purpose agenda, contact us! info@givenagency.com

name: IDEO.org
about_us: IDEO.org is a nonprofit design studio on a mission to design a more just and inclusive world. We partner with nonprofit organizations, foundations, governments, companies, and communities to design programs, products, and services focused on improving health, economic mobility, and wellbeing.

name: ENERGY
about_us:
A dynamic brand experience agency that creates real-life moments your customers feel, talk about, and remember. All done with bags of energy.
 
Our feeling 18 years ago was that there was a gap in the market for a brand experience agency that does better: bigger thinkers, bolder experiences, brighter results.
 
We thought we could offer brands, more.
 
At Energy, we know that blending in means losing out. That’s why we specialise in creating events and experiences that make people feel something. When you have an emotional connection to a brand, you’re more likely to remember it, talk about it, and act on it.
 
The team uses creativity and strategy to nudge your customers in the right direction – towards the action that increases your bottom line.
 
Our focus from day one has been on helping great brands spread their message far and wide.
 
Brands like Louis Vuitton, Rolls-Royce, Samsung and Tik Tok have benefited from brand experiences that have garnered attention, captured hearts and won brand loyalty.

name: UIDesignz - UI UX Design Company
about_us: UIDesignz is a top-rated UI UX Design Agency. Our services include UX/UI, Web designing and App designing by experienced professionals. With an emphasis on research-driven strategies, we are here to address your digital challenges and provide effective solutions that leave you satisfied.

name: The Romans
about_us:
We’re bored of boring PR.

Founded in 2015 and backed by advertising agency Mother, our team has worked with some of the world’s most exciting brands and created some of the most innovative and awarded earned media campaigns of recent years.

In fact, over the past decade we’ve gone from tiny startup to being named Agency Of The Year every year since 2018. And in 2025, PR Week named us Global Agency of The Year. 😅😅😅

There are just two reasons for our success to date. We only hire the best talent around. And we treat every brief and pitch like it’s going to result in our finest piece of work yet.

We specialise in consumer, tech, B2B, sports, digital and corporate PR. 

Sound like something you’d like to hear more about? We’d love to hear from you. 

We're currently based in London, New York, Dubai and Amsterdam.

name: FleishmanHillard
about_us:
Founded in 1946, we push ourselves and our clients to rise above the status quo. As the world’s top communications agency for global clients, we’re committed to doing what’s right and pursuing what matters.
 
We’re on a mission to not only be the world’s most inclusive agency, but to make the world a more inclusive place. FH Perspectives guides DE&I at FleishmanHillard. It’s how we welcome and celebrate the unique experiences and skills each colleague brings to the table. FH4Inclusion, the community service branch of FH Perspectives, is how we spread our culture of inclusion, by donating our time and expertise to local organizations in the fight for social inclusion.
 
We frequently earn 100+ accolades each year, including the coveted Cannes Lions and PRSA Silver Anvils. And we’re a workplace of choice, being named one of Seramount’s (previously NAFE’s) “Top Companies for Executive Women” for 12 years running and one of the Human Rights Campaign’s Best Places to Work for LGBTQ Equality for four consecutive years.
 
FleishmanHillard is part of Omnicom Public Relations Group, and has 79 offices in more than 30 countries, plus affiliates in 45 countries.
 
Scam Alert
FleishmanHillard is committed to a professional and respectful recruiting experience for all candidates. Our official job postings for FleishmanHillard can be found on our Join Us page and emails from us related to the recruiting process will be sent specifically from our @fleishman.com email address. FleishmanHillard will never request money, payment, bank account, credit card or credit score as part of our application process; we will not send you recruiting related emails from any other email domain name, extension, or variation. If you receive a suspicious email that is not sent from a team member specifically at our @fleishman.com email address or if you receive any suspicious outreach on social media, please forward the communication to Vickie.barrett@fleishman.com so that we can review and verify.

name: OLIVER Agency
about_us:
Established in 2004, we are the first and only company to design, build and run bespoke in-house agencies and ecosystems for brands. Today, we create work that delivers business growth, fame and purpose for over 300 clients in 48 countries and counting.  

Our unique model moves at the speed of modern business to drive change from the inside out; working smarter to make our clients’ money go further, and helping them build better solutions, systems and brands. Client solutions include Unilever’s U-Studio (a platform used by almost three-quarters of Unilever's brands globally), and adidas’ off-shore hub.

In 2020 we were ranked #1 in Adweek’s Fastest Growing list (US) and featured in The Drum’s Honours List of the best businesses that helped shape the year.  

We are part of the Inside Ideas Group (IIG), which combines specialisms from Adjust Your Set (content and culture), Dare (design, experience and engineering) and Aylesworth Fleming (property marketing). IIG joined marketing technology group, The Brandtech Group (formerly known as You & Mr Jones) in January 2019 to give their clients access to the latest marketing technology solutions. The group includes tech-driven marketing companies, 55, Mofilm, Collectively, Gravity Road, Blood and Mobkoi, and holds strategic investments in leading technology businesses including Pinterest, Niantic, AI Foundation, VidMob, Jivox, Zappar, EVRYTHNG, Automat, Blacktag and Beeswax.

name: ProCreator - Global UI UX Design Agency
about_us:
ProCreator: Empowering Businesses through Strategic Design! 

Hello, fellow innovators and product owners,

At ProCreator, we understand the challenges and pressures you face daily. Our mission is straightforward: to leverage exceptional UI/UX design to drive your business's ROI, enhance user engagement, and boost conversion rates.

Our CEO, Rajat, often says, "Design is an investment in innovative thinking, positioning, and business growth." We live by this, integrating the latest tech and bespoke strategies to deliver designs that aren't just visually stunning but are tailored for success.

Specializing in industries like BFSI, SaaS, EdTech, Healthcare, and Automotive, we have a proven track record of transforming complex challenges into intuitive solutions for 20+ industries. For instance, our design overhaul for a leading EdTech app increased their user retention rates by 400%, significantly boosting the business value proposition - a testament to the power of strategic design integration.

Our approach? It's all about understanding the nuances of each industry and delivering tailored experiences that not only meet but exceed user expectations. With a team of over 60 design experts, we harness the latest technologies and insights to ensure your product isn't just functional but a market standout.

Investing in design is not just an aesthetic decision but a strategic one. Companies that prioritize good design outperform others by up to 228% on the S&P Index—a clear indicator of the tangible benefits of what we offer.

We’re not just a design agency; we're your strategic partner. Join us at ProCreator, where we make every interaction count and transform challenges into opportunities for growth. Let's discuss how we can turn your project into our next success story.

Why? Because we know making people feel something is more effective in provoking action, changing perceptions or creating narratives that are shared time and time again.

name: Hope&Glory PR
about_us:
Welcome … to the land of Hope&Glory. 
 
If we had to give ourselves a label, we’d describe ourselves as a consumer brand and lifestyle agency that helps organisations connect with consumers through the media that influences them most.
 
But we’d rather skip the label and let you decide for yourself.
 
The agency was started by James Gordon-MacIntosh and Jo Carr back in November 2011. After working together at Seventy Seven PR for three years, they decided to strike out and form their own agency.
 
Starting life as a fledgling agency with clients including O2, D&AD, Meantime and the Isle of Man, Hope&Glory now has a team of over 65 and has added to their client roster names such as IKEA, The Royal Mint, Airbnb, HTC, Virgin Active and adidas.
 
The secret to this success? A steadfast belief in some old-school PR values – like knowing the media and what makes a great story – and being able to convert these to every conceivable field of PR, from social and digital media … to experiential …to stunts … or just a bloody hard-working press office.
 
That means that we come up with award-winning creative platforms that are on-brand and ideas that cut-through and deliver coverage.

name: It's Nice That
about_us:
It’s Nice That’s mission is to inspire the global creative community. We share stories, offer insights and bring people together to help them make more of their creativity.
 
Across our platforms, we reach over 2 million people each month, from students preparing to join the industry to leading creative thinkers. Over the years, we have championed tens of thousands of creatives, which means we have an unmatched network of global creative talent and have become an influential voice in the creative community. At heart, we believe that creative inspiration is for everyone and we want to open this world up to the widest possible audience.

It’s Nice That is a part of Residence, an interdisciplinary network helping innovative, creative talent grow and thrive across art, business and culture. To learn more about Residence and the other companies in the network, please visit here: https://www.residence.co/

If you’d like to get in touch with our team, head here: https://www.itsnicethat.com/contact

name: EMERGE
about_us:
In a world of non-stop news, Emerge brings non-stop hustle to the press office, crafting and landing stories that sit across traditional and emerging editorial verticals to bring brands fame.

Too many brands have been burnt by PR that promises the world and doesn’t deliver. We focus on getting ambitious, category defining brands (from multiple industries) into hearts, minds and hands of the audience’s that matter to them. That means into feeds and phones; the homes of influencers; or direct to the right journalist for the story - all the skills of a classic ‘press office’, different rules.

We set out 7 years ago with two ambitions - to broaden both the idea of where ‘PR activity’ could land editorially and what the ‘average PR girl’ should look, talk and act like. Pushing out standardised press releases doesn’t cut it in today’s fragmented landscape. We’re straight up with our clients about their expectations and needs and we’ve designed a menu of services to launch and scale brands in press and beyond - bespoking the mix that will deliver coverage for them and never selling them on things that aren’t right for them.
Instead of fighting fragmentation of media, we work with it. Distilling brand stories strategically and then blowing them out creatively. We take a multi-channel approach to securing coverage, engagement, shares. So brands can step away from the crowd and get seen when and where it matters most.

We are getting shit done. Join us.

name: Awesome | UI / UX Design Agency
about_us: We specialize in working with startups. Not only can we design everything from MVPs to full-scale products, but as startup founders ourselves, we have the experience and know-how to help bring those designs to fruition—whether it's raising seed funding, prototyping, or getting into accelerator programs. We're not just focused on pushing pixels and then passing them on to the next person in the assembly line (or as we like to call it, design-and-ditch), we're looking at the big picture. Unlike traditional agencies, we take pride in being hands-on through the entire process; something we’ve found can be critical to the success of a startup.

about_us:

We make brands more valuable and less vulnerable.

We build brands differently. We work with our clients to define and solve their business problems through the lens of brand. We strategically join the dots between our design, experience, governance and measurement capabilities, and always connect our brand work to business outcomes. 

The Landor Group also includes amp (sonic branding), BDG (workplace & architectural experts), Deeplocal (creative technologists) and ManvsMachine (3D motion design).

name: W Communications
about_us:
Founded in 2009, W Communications is a fiercely independent, communications and public relations agency that unites brands with culture to deliver commercial success.

Operating at the intersection of consumers, commerce, and culture, our global network leverages award-winning creativity and strategy.

This has earned us a reputation for delivering more than category-defining earned media, positioning us among the world’s top agencies. We have won countless industry awards, including 20 Cannes Lions and PR Week’s ‘Agency of the Decade’. Over the last 12 months, we have also been awarded both ‘Best Integrated Agency Of The Year’ and ‘Global Consumer Agency Of The Year’.

Working across the full spectrum of earned media, social and digital, we represent global brands, market-leading innovators and dynamic start-ups. Our roster includes the entire Unilever food portfolio (Marmite, PG Tips, Ben & Jerry's, Pot Noodle etc), as well as the likes of Adidas, Tinder, Kellogg’s, Sony, Disney and England Rugby. 

Our philosophy has always been to find the most effective answers (not merely the most convenient ones) to our clients’ challenges, and to be judged on the business changing results we deliver.

With headquarters in London, offices in New York, Singapore, KSA and the Nordic, W is an agency with global vision and international capability.

name: Kingdom Collective
about_us:
Kingdom Collective is a communications agency sitting at the juncture of underground and mainstream culture. We’re embedded in the scenes and subcultures shaping the future.

We connect our clients with cultural opinion leaders, communities and influential networks, to help them achieve genuine impact and measurable reach. Beyond awareness, we create campaigns with integrity that positively affect how people think and feel.

From insight to execution, our approach translates business needs into strategies that grow cultural equity for clients, helping them engage audiences through the things they love.

We believe passionately in culture as a catalyst for change. We’re inspired by seeing our work drive progress and enrich lives.

name: Figma
about_us: MCP MCP MCP

name: Headland
about_us:
We are a communications consultancy powered by collaboration.

Good reputations give businesses the legitimacy to create the conditions and opportunities to thrive financially, socially, and environmentally, even in challenging times. 

We believe that reputations are built on purposeful relationships with all stakeholders, and they happen by design. 

Through a method and culture of collaboration amongst our experts, we shine a light on all perspectives and help businesses act on those insights. 

Those actions provide the impetus for powerful communications and give rise to reputations that put our clients in control of their futures.

name: Because of Marketing
about_us:
Founded by Rachael Higgins, Because of Marketing is a leading online marketing publication renowned for its coverage of the latest marketing campaigns, trends, industry news and insights to an audience of professionals, marketers, entrepreneurs and thought leaders. 

With a community and following of over 350,000 individuals, we provide insightful and inspirational advertising and marketing content, high-quality analysis, networking opportunities and support for marketers and brands within the global marketing industry.

To discuss brand partnerships, sponsors or features, please email partnerships@becauseofmarketing.com

name: Yellowchalk Design
about_us:
Yellowchalk is a highly-rated boutique UI/UX design studio headquartered in Bangalore, India, with an office in Singapore. With over 250+ clients worldwide, the company has worked with top multinationals like eMudhra, EY, Intel, Changi Airport, Titan, Axis Capital and more, as well as impactful start-ups like Fast&Up, HackerRank, Hevo, QNU Labs, and many others.

Yellowchalk’s area of expertise extends to User Interface Design (UI), User Experience Design (UX), Brand Identity Design, Product Strategy & Research, and Development. The company believes in becoming seamless extensions of creative minds to build functional, responsive, and dynamic products — that provide its users with a world-class experience.

name: ThisUX – Global UI/UX Design Studio
about_us: We design, develop and launch digital products for startups & enterprises. Focused on crafting useful, delightful MVPs and solutions.

name: Design Studio - UI/UX Design Agency
about_us:
Welcome to Design Studio. We are one of the most highly-rated mobile & web UI/UX design agency. 

We provide advanced UI/UX design services to businesses of all sizes industries.
From conducting UI/UX research to creating fully-functional design prototypes, our team of creatives, UI/UX designers, & digital strategists do it all to help our clients create premium-grade digital products.

So far, we’ve partnered with various leading healthcare, banking, fintech, EdTech, fashion, real estate, & food brands. We even help local, small-scale NGOs leverage the power of design innovation & impress target audiences.

Design Studio’s specialty is that we’re involved in every stage of our clients’ digital projects.

Before we create awe-inspiring UI/UX designs for our clients’ websites & mobile apps, we consult with them.

After several days or weeks of consultation, strategizing, & collaborating, we start designing our clients’ digital products. This approach helps us learn our clients’ specific needs & deliver results quicker.

We can create high-fidelity design prototypes for your company’s new digital products in no time. We can even create UI/UX solutions for your company’s enterprise software tools. 

We also specialize in cross-platform compatibility UI/UX design.
Design Studio’s designs always have cross-platform compatibilities & they deliver friction-free user experiences across all platforms. That’s why our digital products always have memorable
visual identities. 

More importantly, they have functional & user-oriented features. If your business is in need of high-quality online visual branding, contact us now. 

Our web & mobile app designs never fail to excite, engage, and convert. Allow us to work our design magic into your business.

name: Coolr
about_us: Coolr is an award-winning social media and influencer marketing agency, with offices in London and Los Angeles. Voted Digital Agency of the Year 2022.

name: Golin
about_us: We are a global public relations agency that helps companies create change that matters. Our people help us do the best work of our lives for our clients. Work that earns attention and showcases the power of collaboration. Golin was proudly named in PRWeek US' 2024 Agency of the Year, 2022 Best Places to Work, PRWeek’s Global Agency of the Year in 2021, 2020 and 2019, PRovoke Media’s 2021 North American Large Agency of the Year and listed to the Chicago Tribune’s Top Workplaces in 2021.

name: Portland
about_us:
At Portland, we strive to combine high level strategic counsel with quality execution. Across our targeted network of offices we have the right people, with the right expertise, and the right attitude.

We draw on experience across the political world and global institutions spanning Downing Street and Whitehall to the UN and the WHO.

Our roster of former editors from a wide range of media outlets know how traditional media is changing and explain how to cut through.

Our team of digital brains apply the lessons of the world’s most effective grassroots mobilisation campaigns and know how to change the conversation.
And our team of creative designers and brand strategists produce powerful content that ensures our clients reach their audiences with impact – whether through a website, app, video production, train station takeover or interactive data visualisation.

They combine with heavyweights in financial PR, healthcare, law, philanthropy and internal communications and together we get to the point – bringing focus, clarity and driving impact.

name: SB+CO
about_us:
SB+CO is a sustainability consultancy that advises companies on strategy, sustainability activation and integration, ESG, stakeholder engagement and communications – and frequently a combination of all of these.

Nigel Salter and Penny Baxter are the ‘SB’ in SB+CO, bringing a combined 50-plus years of expertise in sustainable business and corporate responsibility. Two decades ago, Nigel and Penny founded Salterbaxter, building it up into one of the UK’s top 10 sustainability management consultancies, before integrating it into the global Publicis Groupe. 

Today, they lead a highly experienced and diverse team in London, with colleagues and associates across Europe and the US. Each of us at SB+CO is a passionate change-maker and this is reflected in the solid track record we have in helping some of the world’s largest corporations and iconic brands pivot their business models towards a more sustainable, equitable and successful future.

name: Please See//
about_us: Headquartered in Mumbai, Please See is a creative agency specialising in building brands through strategy, packaging, design and marketing.

name: Designit
about_us:
Hello, we’re Designit, a Wipro company. We’re an award-winning experience innovation company with creativity at our core. 

For more than 30 years, we’ve helped businesses build competitive advantage and deliver positive change through creative pragmatism. 

We use our expertise in strategy, design, marketing, and tech to create bespoke solutions to the most complex of client problems. Our clients include BMW, Kraft-Heinz, and Microsoft. 

Across 14 locations from Aarhus to Australia, we’re home to 700+ designers, analysts, creators, strategists, and marketers, united by a single ambition to create the change we want to see in the world and turn innovation into progress that can be shared by all. 

To learn more, follow us @designit or visit www.designit.com. 

---

Note: We want to help you find your next job – safely!

There’s been a rise in job scams recently on LinkedIn. Please keep in mind that official communications regarding Designit job opportunities will be sent from email addresses ending with @designit.com.

Be cautious of any correspondence originating from other email domains and refrain from engaging in such cases. And remember, only share your personal information with sources you trust. Happy job searching!

We are proud to currently rank as the #1 global agency network for creative excellence and effectiveness by WARC, signifying our ability to deliver creative solutions that drive unreasonable impact for clients and communities.

name: PORTO ROCHA
about_us:
PORTO ROCHA is a New York-based design studio developing creative and strategic work that engages deeply with the world we live in.

Working closely with people and companies to craft branding systems, products and experiences, we seek to provoke meaningful change through our work, from large-scale projects that reach significant audiences to socially and culturally-motivated initiatives.

Since 2016, PORTO ROCHA has launched brands, products, books, websites, campaigns and experiences with clients that range from global tech and retail companies to independent artists and cultural institutions.

name: Red Consultancy
about_us:
At Red Consultancy, we help brands take on tomorrow – with clarity, creativity, and the confidence to lead.
 
As the PR agency for what’s now and what’s next, we bring three decades of experience to the moments that matter most, helping brands not just keep up, but move ahead.
 
In an ever-changing world where tomorrow has never been more uncertain, we plan strategically and act decisively to deal with what's now and what's next. Come and see us in Covent Garden.

name: Fahrenheit 212
about_us:
Fahrenheit 212 is an innovation strategy and design firm. 

We define innovation strategies and develop new products, services, and experiences that create sustainable, profitable growth for our clients.
 
We challenge the belief that innovation is inherently unreliable, and have spent the last fifteen years designing the method, building the model, and assembling the minds to make innovation a predictable driver of growth for our clients’ businesses.

We’re privileged to work with some of the world’s most innovative companies, and we’re proud of the impact we’ve had on their brands and businesses.

Our team of innovation practitioners, based in New York, London and Paris, work across a wide range of industries and geographies. And while we bring together diverse capabilities of strategy, idea development, research, branding, and design, we are united in our commitment to delivering measurable impact for our clients. We call this a belief in "innovation designed to deliver." In 2016, we joined the Capgemini Group.

name: FACTORY PR
about_us: Factory PR is a leading communications agency that uniquely intersects style and technology. We build and launch many of the world’s most transformative brands, with our dynamic offering of public relations, influencer, and social media services. Our HQ is in New York, with West Coast office in Los Angeles.

name: DesignDreams
about_us:
Your all-in-one solution for creativity, innovation, and growth.

✨ Who We Are:
At DesignDreams, we’re a dynamic team of experts passionate about bringing ideas to life. From crafting cutting-edge digital solutions to designing unforgettable brand experiences, we’re here to help businesses thrive in today’s fast-paced world.

name: Design Monks - UI UX | Branding | SaaS | Webapp Design Agency
about_us:
Design Monks is not just another design agency—we’re your growth partner in the digital world. With a passionate in-house team of 30+ extraordinary designers and developers, we help brands build stunning, intuitive, and high-converting digital experiences through world-class UI/UX design, website design, and full-stack development. From the very first wireframe to the final line of code, everything we do is focused on one thing: helping your business grow.

We’ve proudly worked with some of the world’s most respected names, including Telenor, Axiata, Viber, Akij, IPDC, and many more across industries and continents. Whether you’re launching an EdTech platform, scaling your Fintech app, building the next big thing in Crypto, or revamping your Fitness brand’s digital presence—Design Monks brings the clarity, speed, and craft to make it happen.

Our process is simple but powerful. We listen, we strategize, and we execute with pixel-perfect precision. Every design decision is backed by user research and crafted to improve usability, retention, and conversions. We don’t believe in guesswork. We believe in design that works—and looks damn good doing it.

At Design Monks, we offer both project-based and monthly retainer models, making us the perfect partner for startups, founders, and fast-growing businesses who want top-tier design without the overhead of building an in-house team. And yes, we’re incredibly affordable too.

Over the years, we’ve become a go-to design agency for startups and enterprise teams looking for quality, speed, and results. Our work has spanned industries like EdTech, Fintech, Fitness, Crypto, SaaS, eCommerce and 20 others, earning us the reputation of being one of the best global UI/UX design agencies in the space.

Ideas Center UCU (ex CfE Accelerator UCU): Igniting Ideas. Driving Changes.

name: It's Nice That
about_us:
It’s Nice That’s mission is to inspire the global creative community. We share stories, offer insights and bring people together to help them make more of their creativity.
 
Across our platforms, we reach over 2 million people each month, from students preparing to join the industry to leading creative thinkers. Over the years, we have championed tens of thousands of creatives, which means we have an unmatched network of global creative talent and have become an influential voice in the creative community. At heart, we believe that creative inspiration is for everyone and we want to open this world up to the widest possible audience.

It’s Nice That is a part of Residence, an interdisciplinary network helping innovative, creative talent grow and thrive across art, business and culture. To learn more about Residence and the other companies in the network, please visit here: https://www.residence.co/

about_us:

If you like working with a few insane but creative people, let us know how we can be of help to you!

We can do some really awesome work together!

name: Lippincott
about_us:
Lippincott is a global creative consultancy. With a passion for solving our client’s toughest challenges, we create, grow and transform brands to define industries and transcend categories. 

A pioneer since 1943, we have shaped some of the world’s most iconic brands and experiences. From Coca-Cola to Samsung and Starbucks to Delta, our work drives growth and adds meaning to customers’ lives. 

As the brand and innovation experts of Oliver Wyman, we integrate deep industry, risk and operational expertise to deliver end-to-end solutions. Together, we create new possibilities for our clients to thrive in the future.

name: One Minute Briefs
about_us: We promote brands & causes via social media by challenging our creative community on Twitter to respond with instinctive ideas to daily advertising briefs & reward the best entries. All submissions are retweeted to our 39.5k+ followers, which generates millions of impressions every single day, enabling brands to interact with huge audiences in an engaging, cost-effective way whilst creating quality content. OMB serves as a popular, diverse & inclusive social network for the creative industry across the world and we host regular workshops, talks & events for our followers, otherwise known as the OMBLES.

name: Ogilvy UK
about_us:
Ogilvy UK inspires brands and people to impact the world. Our iconic, culture-changing, value driving ideas have delivered sustained growth for clients since David Ogilvy founded the company in 1948. Ogilvy UK has businesses specialising in Advertising Brand & Content, PR & Influence, Experience, Consulting & Behavioural Science and Health. Each deliver world-class award-winning creative solutions for clients including Coca-Cola, Mondelez, Sainsbury’s, Lloyds Banking Group, F1, The Mayor of London, Sipsmith and Samsung. We build on our legacy through our Borderless Creativity mantra - operating, innovating and creating at the intersection of our capabilities and talent. It is at this inflection point where the impact and magic lies. We call this borderless creativity. 

Ogilvy UK also has six incredible employee networks dedicated to Diversity, Equity and Inclusion - Roots, Rewired, Proud, Equals, MPower and Parents & Carers.

The digital experiences designed and built by us have touched and transformed over a billion lives. As a one-stop solution for every design and development need, our expertise in every industry domain and our ability to deliver projects of any scale distinguish us from other creative studios. Riot Communications exists to create a better world through the promotion of culture and entertainment.

We campaign for the recognition of culture and entertainment as powerful tools to solve some of the world’s greatest challenges, and we advocate to safeguard creativity in education for future generations.

about_us: Hill & Knowlton is a strategic and creative partner to drive breakthrough opportunities for growth and value creation, advance corporate strategy, and build reputation capital and resiliency.
