name: Sancroft
about_us:
Sancroft is an award-winning sustainability consultancy based in London. For 25 years we have worked exclusively on ESG, helping leading corporations and financial firms navigate the ESG landscape and harness the opportunities that sustainable business brings.

We believe in creating a just and sustainable world through the energy, ingenuity, and impact of business and finance.

Founded in 1997 by former Secretary of State for the Environment, The Rt. Hon John Gummer, Lord Deben, Sancroft helps some of the world’s leading organisations improve their environmental, ethical and social impact, as well as grow their bottom lines. Sancroft works to strengthen the ambition of businesses to act sustainably, and increase the capacity of businesses to do so by designing strategies, systems and processes that connect sustainability to core business.

Sancroft’s areas of expertise are Sustainability Strategy, Responsible Sourcing, Environmental Regulations, ESG Due Diligence, Business & Human Rights, and Property & Development. 

Please see our website www.sancroft.com for more information and how to contact us.

name: KARLA OTTO
about_us:
WHO WE ARE
Founded in 1982, Karla Otto is a full-service brand-building agency, operating from fifteen cities across the globe, Milan, Paris, London, Munich, Dubai, Riyadh, Jeddah, New York, Los Angeles, Hong Kong, Beijing, Shanghai, Singapore, Tokyo and Seoul. 

WHAT WE DO
Karla Otto’s service is unparalleled. Built on the founder’s pioneering spirit, discerning eye and intuition, our global team is dedicated to delivering work that expertly combines detail and local precision with large-scale impact.

Blending the best of fashion, beauty, design, lifestyle, and arts & culture, we offer a panoramic view of opportunities and the ability to execute complex ideas.

Our loyal network and unrivalled approach to culture and community enables us to take brands to brave new territories.

CAREERS
At Karla Otto we are always interested in hearing from our industry's experts in Strategy, Creative, Talent, Experiences and Communication.  If you are a driven to deliver excellence, agile and conscientious, as well as want to work with remarkable clients, please review our openings. 

THE INDEPENDENTS
The Independents is a global group of industry leaders across luxury and lifestyle, comprising Atelier Athem, Atelier LUM, Bureau Béatrice, Bureau Betak, Bureau Future, CTZAR, INCA, K2, Karla Otto, Kennedy, Kitten Production, Lefty, PRODJECT, Sunshine and The Qode. The collective is powerfully positioned to offer streamlined strategy, creative, talent, influencer marketing, experiences and communications services for leading brands across key territories. To find out more, please visit:
http://www.the-independents.com/

name: KCD
about_us: KCD is a global leader in brand experience with offices in New York, Paris, London, and Los Angeles. For more than 40 years, the agency has developed and applied its unparalleled fashion expertise while also servicing culture-driven industries across popular, luxury and community pillars. KCD’s teams work with brands that span emerging to established, amplifying new buzz, and maintaining legacy power alike. With customized creative strategies, comprehensive public relations campaigns, and world-class event solutions, KCD’s precision-focused execution makes an impact across today’s most relevant channels. Always at the frontier of innovation, KCD is dedicated to a continuum of experience: Catalyzing it, creating it, and ensuring that it lasts.

You can find out more here: wearecollins.com

name: Siegel+Gale
about_us:
We’re a global brand consultancy built for this moment— untangling the complicated, distilling what matters, building trust where it counts, and helping you show up in ways that are fresh, fearless, and unmistakably you.
To win today, brands must stand out. We help them break through by staying true to who they are.

name: The Brand Identity
about_us:
This is the home of Graphic Design’s Greatest. That’s right. The Greatest. From the designers, studios, type foundries and brands at the top of their game, to the best products and jobs in the business.

What is The Greatest, you might ask? To us, it’s not reputation, location or origin. Greatness can come from anywhere. It can be anything. Beautiful or functional. Unexpected or unusual. Loud or quiet. Familiar or new. Whatever it is, it’s rooted in quality. Quality over everything.

We’ve been labelled as many things over the years – a blog, marketplace, platform, even the news or the press. We’re not too worried about titles. What we are, for sure, is a curious creative team with a relentless commitment to curation and community.

What started in 2015 as an Instagram account meticulously curating projects has become a treasure trove that is now trusted by a forward-thinking community of more than 900,000 creatives and companies.

Our features go beyond inspiration to provide insight, advice and recommendations from the top 1% of designers, studios, type foundries and brands.

Our store unites the greatest products for work and life in one place, offering a selection of mockups, templates, assets, books and posters created or curated by our team.

Our jobs page casts aside uninspiring text-heavy listings in favour of visual layouts, transparent salaries, flexible posting times and a fair pricing model, making it easier to find the perfect fit.

Together, they form the leading destination for insights, products and jobs. Fuelled by the work, knowledge and support of the graphic design industry’s top 1%.

about_us: A WPP company, Design Bridge and Partners is a global brand design agency. We believe a better world is possible, and we want to help make it happen. We feel it in our hearts, we think about it constantly in our heads, we spend our time using our skills creatively and knowledge to making it real.

This makes us scrappy and unstoppable when it comes to getting things done. We work at a relentless pace. We consume news, art and culture. We’re thirsty to learn, grow and be better than we were yesterday. One of our core values is honesty, and not in the sense of truth-telling, although we do that too. We’re brutally honest with our clients and ourselves when and where changes are needed.

We lead as a family-first employer. We’re proudly female-owned and committed to diversity and inclusion. We know that when you take care of your people, everyone wins. Our every day is about continual improvement. We work to be a little bit better than we were the day before until we have actually left the world better than the way we found it.

name: WILL
about_us:
Will is a powerful thing. It’s the courage to do what others won’t. It’s the high dive. The extra mile. The bold truth. It’s knowing that the greatest rewards lie beyond the beaten path. And trusting that, together, we have the ability to reach them. We’re here for people, businesses, and brands who dare to be different. Because we’re all better when we’re brave.

Will is a full-service creative agency, which is a really boring way of saying “we make stuff.” But we don’t just make any old stuff. Whether it’s a brand, a campaign or a bowl of guacamole, we connect insight and instinct to create things that are unignorable. 

It takes strategy. It takes creativity. But, most importantly, it takes the will to do what others won’t. We’re here to inspire bravery in our clients, our work, and each other. Because the ideas that keep us up at night are the same ones we get out of bed for every morning. There’s no honesty without courage, no different without daring, and no team without tenacity. We’re all better when we’re brave. Or at least, a lot more interesting.

Our ethos is simple; to lavish as much design creativity and digital expertise as budgets and timeframes allow, then go the extra mile on each and every client project, as if was our own; as if our business depended on it.

about_us:
Mosaic is a North American integrated marketing agency that builds brands in dimension. Depending on clients’ needs and based on data-led insights, Mosaic pulls in the right capability experts at the right time to create connected brand experiences across the right touchpoints. By being able to quickly tap into different in-house specialists across omnichannel commerce, experiential marketing, content development, brand design, performance media and measurement & analytics, Mosaic is distinctly able to create ideas that make an impact in culture and drive results at the same time.  With a 30-year history, Mosaic North America has hubs in Chicago, Dallas, and Toronto, augmented with experts in locations across North America; all connected to our parent company Acosta Group, offering full reach across the nation. 

Mosaic est une agence nord-américaine de marketing intégré qui bâtit des marques multidimensionnelles. En fonction des besoins de ses clients et sur la base de données, Mosaic fait appel aux bons experts au bon moment pour créer des expériences de marque connectées à travers les bons points de contact. En pouvant rapidement faire appel à différents spécialistes internes dans les domaines du commerce omnicanal, du marketing expérientiel, du développement de contenu, de la conception de marque, des médias de performance et de la mesure et de l'analyse, Mosaic est en mesure de créer des idées qui ont un impact sur la culture et conduisent à des résultats en même temps.  Forte de ses 30 ans d'existence, Mosaic Amérique du Nord dispose de centres à Chicago, Dallas et Toronto, auxquels s'ajoutent des experts dans toute l'Amérique du Nord, tous reliés à notre société mère Acosta Group, ce qui nous permet d'être présents dans tout le pays.

name: Takt
about_us:
At Takt, we believe bold ideas have the power to transform the ordinary into the extraordinary.

Since 2012, we’ve been building more than brands—we’ve been creating movements. Takt (formerly Massive Media) is an independent, award-winning creative agency based in Canada, known for bringing clarity to complexity and turning vision into reality.

Our work begins with a question: What story do you want to tell? From there, we craft cohesive brand narratives that flow seamlessly across every touchpoint—websites, campaigns, and content that don’t just make an impact but build momentum. Whether it’s redefining a company’s identity or building digital platforms that inspire action, we thrive on creating work that is as meaningful as it is beautiful.

We partner with organizations that have the courage to lead. Our clients include iconic names like NYU, UBC, CBC, Amazon, and Alphabet—businesses that understand the value of bold thinking and purposeful storytelling. They trust us not just to meet their expectations but to elevate their vision, pushing boundaries to create something unforgettable.

What sets us apart is how we weave clarity, creativity, and strategy into every project. We believe strong narratives are the foundation of every great brand, and when those narratives align with design and technology, they become transformational. Our goal is not just to build brands but to create lasting emotional connections—experiences that move people and turn audiences into advocates.

As an independent agency, we pride ourselves on agility, collaboration, and a relentless commitment to craft. From the first conversation to the final deliverable, our team of strategists, designers, and storytellers work as an extension of your own, helping you define your purpose, share your story, and amplify your impact.

Because at Takt, we know the best brands don’t just tell their story—they live it. Let’s build something bold together.

name: Pigeon Brands
about_us:
We are one of North America’s leading independent agencies specializing in strategy, brand design, and communication. For nearly 50 years, we’ve partnered with iconic brands such as Danone, IKEA, Hershey, Irving, Perdue Farms, Corby Spirit and Wine, and Metro. With truth as our rocket fuel, we deliver impactful solutions grounded in design thinking, designed to make people buy, love and recommend brands.
We believe in collaboration, boundless curiosity, and a relentless pursuit of excellence. Powered by positive energy and strong values, our team of 80+ communication professionals, based in Montreal and Toronto, is driven by a clear mission: to create impactful ideas that build strong relationships and lasting value. Because at the end of the day, we make our mark on the world, one truth at a time.

name: Rheo (Acquired by Unacademy)
about_us:

Rheo TV was set up in August 2019 by Saksham Keshri and Prakash Kumar. Saksham has built teams and products from scratch at multiple fast-growing startups including Unacademy and JioSaavn. Prakash previously worked as a product engineer for Cuemath and Unacademy and has experience in building video platforms that have scaled to serve millions of users. Today, India has nearly 200 million active gamers on smartphones. Ubiquitous internet infrastructure and affordable smartphones are leading to the increasing popularity of multi-player online gaming in India and Rheo TV is tapping into this phenomenon.

Only Much Louder is a market-leading, full-service creative and entertainment business network that has instigated pop culture for over two decades by creating iconic moments across television, digital content, fan experiences, branded entertainment and in the artist-creators community. Celebrated for creating India's first multi-genre music festival, the NH7 Weekender, OML has built India’s independent music and comedy scene from the ground-up. They won the first-ever Branded Content and Entertainment Cannes Lion for ‘Dewarists’ and have been the first homegrown content business to have a strong footprint in over 22 countries.
Today, OML businesses include -:
Artist Management: Representing the best talent in the country including comedians, actors, chefs, hosts, writers, directors, creators, illusionists, and more.
Content Studio: Developing and producing original long-form scripted and unscripted content for television and streaming platforms since 2016 with over 32 shows and 69 comedy specials, across Amazon Prime, Netflix, MTV, Disney + Hotstar and more.
Branded Content: With businesses in the creative and branded content space Only Much Louder has serviced some of the biggest global brands like Tinder, Netflix, OPPO India, Amazon, TIRA Beauty, Canva India and more.
1862: A groundbreaking branded content and influencer marketing agency with active campaigns in 22 countries and teams in Russia, Poland, Nigeria and Japan.
GCN: The full-service strategic and creative agency at the intersection of advertising, branded content, communication design and social media.
Hypothesis: Over two decades of working with agencies, brands and influencers has helped us identify gaps and challenges in influencer marketing, resulting in Hypothesis, a comprehensive AI-enabled influencer marketing platform that services the entire influencer marketing journey and has executed more than 150 campaigns.

Nuestra ventaja reside en la experiencia adquirida en el origen y en que mantenemos una cadena integrada sin intermediarios, lo que nos permite ofrecer una calidad y estabilidad en los productos muy superior a nuestros competidores, durante los doce meses del año.

Torry Harris, conoce a través de nuestros distribuidores de toda la vida y ahora también con nuestros propios asesores foodservice, cuales son las verdaderas necesidades del restaurador u hostelero. Para que nuestros distribuidores aumenten sus beneficios en su negocio.

name: India Art Fair
about_us:
India Art Fair is the leading platform to discover modern and contemporary art from South Asia. 

Taking place annually in India’s capital, New Delhi, the fair presented in partnership with BMW India, reflects the city’s fast-developing local arts scene, while offering curated insights into the cultural landscapes of neighbouring countries. The fair’s programme - which draws together galleries and artists, private foundations and arts charities, artists’ collectives, national institutions, cultural events and festivals - enables international audiences to engage in innovative ways with the cultural history and development of the region. The fair is committed to supporting arts education and professional development opportunities, recognising the crucial need to support the development of the local arts scene, and provide dedicated exhibition space to emerging galleries and arts organisations. 

Year-round, the fair aims to run an extensive programme of events, including education initiatives, artist commissions and pop-up programmes, aiming to increase audiences for the arts within India.

The 15th edition of the fair will take place at the NSIC Grounds, Okhla, New Delhi from 1 to 4 February 2024.

about_us:

name: Look Who's Talking
about_us:
Brands have stories; and stories engage when they are told in an interactive way to the right audience, not when they are presented as advertisements. That’s where Look Who’s Talking (LWT) comes into play.

LWT is in the business of Digital PR and related services to brands and agencies across India with a bag of influential storytellers on all the eminent digital platforms such as Blogs, Instagram, Twitter, Snapchat and YouTube.

Here at LWT, we believe in Creative Brand Advocacy By and For Mobile’s First Generation. That is, we become a conduit between the digital influencers and the TG of the brand while adding a human touch of storytelling. As we know that consumers trust user-generated content and word-of-mouth more than advertising.

We have individual as well as organized experience of more than 5 years in the field. We know what people want to engage with; whom they look up for advice; and how to connect a brand with their TG in an efficient manner. 

Headquartered at New Delhi, we are proud to have shared the stories of Aircel, Maruti Suzuki India, MakeMyTrip, BookMyShow and many more.

name: Dostcast
about_us:
Dostcast is the only Indian podcast with the widest range of conversations and interviews. 

Politicians. Performers. Philosophers. No topic is out of bounds. No guest is too taboo. 
No conversation is too unsafe for this show. Watch or listen to Dostcast every Tuesday and Friday at 8 PM Indian Standard Time. 

About the host: Vinamre Kasanaa is a writer and content creator. He studied advertising and religion at Boston University and returned home to setup the best conversation network for Indians. And unlike, most Indian podcast hosts, Vinamre actually does his research.

name: Princeton10, LLP
about_us:
Princeton10—Not an agency*

*The layer-laden teams. The prehistoric processes. The impersonal, ego-driven dog-and-pony shows. Take what you think you know about marketing and advertising agencies and burn it. P10 was born of the idea that if something isn’t working—or could work better—change it. And that’s exactly what we did. We know that what we’re not makes us who we are. And we’re not just another agency. We are people driven by a palpable passion and purpose, felt by our clients from the very first conversation. We’re the agency you never thought existed. We are P10.

P10 brings together a team of diverse, remote-only, seasoned professionals to deliver exceptional value for our clients. Dare to do something different - join us.

name: Deloitte
about_us:
Deloitte drives progress. Our firms around the world help clients become leaders wherever they choose to compete. Deloitte invests in outstanding people of diverse talents and backgrounds and empowers them to achieve more than they could elsewhere. Our work combines advice with action and integrity. We believe that when our clients and society are stronger, so are we. 

Deloitte refers to one or more of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited (“DTTL”), its global network of member firms, and their related entities. DTTL (also referred to as “Deloitte Global”) and each of its member firms are legally separate and independent entities. DTTL does not provide services to clients. Please see www.deloitte.com/about to learn more.

The content on this page contains general information only, and none of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited, its member firms, or their related entities (collectively the “Deloitte Network”) is, by means of this publication, rendering professional advice or services. No entity in the Deloitte Network shall be responsible for any loss whatsoever sustained by any person who relies on content from this page.

name: Insane Labs
about_us:
At Insane, we keep sanity in the back seat.

Being Insane prevents normal behaviour, which is why the folks who work here have been putting in the endless hours for the past three years to help us grow at a lightning speed! The freedom to work from our fully stacked office or while travelling anywhere in the world, and yet deliver exceptional results for the clients is the kick they get used to here.

Being Insane prevents normal perception which already clutters the market space. Creating out of the box campaigns, coming up with exceptional concepts is what gives us all that rush we need to remain insane.

Being Insane helps prevent normal social interaction, and drives us to come up with off beat  strategies. Everyone here has their own niche, be it in paid ads, conversion rate or customer value optimization, our workspace are full of meditative faces, deep involved conquering hurdles making our clients richer. This freedom to make decisions, this freedom to play is what helps Insane grow.

Insane results for our past clients, has helped us handpick clients that are as insane as us, who can keep up and stay sane when we propel them with 10x growth. name: Zulu Alpha Kilo
about_us:
With 185 staff in New York, Toronto, and Vancouver, Zulu Alpha Kilo (Z.A.K. for short) was founded in 2008. We’re proud that our shop has built a reputation as an industry outlier and one of the most respected independent creative agencies in the world. Trade publications have written that Z.A.K. stands out as a ‘maverick global indie agency’ within the fiercely competitive advertising industry dominated by global holding companies. 
 
In 2016, Ad Age named us Small Agency of the Year and in 2017, 2021 and 2022, International Small Agency of the Year. We were featured as one of Forbes Top 100 Innovators of 2018, The Drum’s Agency of the Year 2021, and Campaign US 2021 Independent Agency of the Year. For three years running, Fast Company has recognized our work in their World Changing Ideas issue. In 2022, we were listed among the top ten independent agencies in the world in Cannes, One Show and D&AD, based on a body of effective, breakthrough work. 
 
We were founded on the belief that the world needs more creativity. It’s what drives all our decision-making. There is just so much ineffective, badly crafted work in the world that never gets noticed, has zero impact and is a waste of client budgets. We are here to change all that.
 
When you truly embrace creativity as a competitive advantage, you will see it transform your world and your business. We’ve witnessed this over and over with our own clients. 
 
And, as a purpose-driven company, we also use our creativity to do good in the world by supporting causes we truly believe in. 
 
Want to change your world as a marketer? Let’s fight sameness together.

Touché! attracts people that are motivated to push the boundaries of what is possible. People that seek to find a better way. Our culture, systems and process have been very carefully created to foster this. Planners use interactive frameworks and proprietary thinking techniques to guide them.

Our interactive systems benefit from the collective intelligence of the OMG network and the most cutting-edge thinking from across the world of marketing and the social sciences – from behavioural economics and cognitive psychology through to econometric meta-analysis.

For optimisation, Touché! uses sophisticated tools and systems that allow for investment setting & allocation, target audience refinement, channel selection & allocation, flighting, integration, measurement and monitoring.

We place the entirety of our experience at the service of our clients and their creative projects in which we are fully invested.

Jean-Sébastien Baillat, the studio's founder and creative director, has been instrumental in the milieu of graphic design and digital art for upwards of 15 years. Baillat Studio sets itself apart with numerous prestigious national and international awards, including a Cannes Lion.

-
Baillat Studio is forever striving to reach new heights at the forefront of design. Closely aligned with the cultural milieus of music and digital art, the studio excels within experimental and conventional paradigms. Our creative sensibility is driven by an emphasis on play, where every detail is carefully considered. Baillat collaborates with a global team of highly specialized individuals that help bring our visions to life. Passion, people and determination are at the core of our practice. LET'S DANCE.

name: Project GTO Publishing
about_us:
Project GTO Publishing is an amalgamation of 4 highly engaging magazines with spectacular content created by auto enthusiasts,.

-- evo India is devoted to ‘The Thrill Of Driving’ and puts the reader firmly behind the wheel and in the saddle to celebrate the motoring experience. Keeping pace with the changing needs of the motorist while remaining faithful to the mantra ‘The Thrill Of Driving’, evo’s core team of experienced writers, photographers and filmmakers produce award-winning content that is respected globally for its integrity and professionalism.

-- Fast Bikes India, is a monthly magazine that caters exclusively to the Indian two-wheeler enthusiast. With its award-winning content, Fast Bikes has a reputation for incisive testing, witty writing and breathtaking photography and the Indian edition also has all these qualities to the Indian biking enthusiast while also helping consumers make that all-important purchase decision.

-- Motor Sport India is a bi-monthly magazine Published in association with the FMSCI,  that is focused on Indian racing, rallying, karting, drag racing, supercross, TSD… basically every form of motor racing in the country, big or small, national or local, on land or even on water, we have reported on events taking place in every single corner of the country. We go to extra efforts to make sure Indian teams participating in international championships are featured in the magazine and we are focused on bringing their stories to the Indian enthusiast.

-- Off Road is a credible, authoritative and stand-alone magazine devoted to the burgeoning off- road culture in India and abroad. The primary objective is to enhance the awareness of off-roading (events, participants, organizers and supporters) in India, exciting the enthusiast, educating him/her about a culture that has been around for ages and now gathering momentum.

name: LastBench
about_us:

Every organization operates under a different set of circumstances. Some have large offices, some work in the remotest of locations; some people are great in front of the camera, while some dislike the camera; some organizations are thinking about diversity and inclusion, while some are still ideating their story. In less than 2 years, we have worked with ideas to just-named products, with early stage startups to an 82 year old conglomerate, with government enterprises to non-government organizations. name: WinZO
about_us:
WinZO is the largest social gaming and interactive entertainment platform in India. Launched in early 2018, the Company partners with third-party developers to host games on their Android and iOS apps, where users can enjoy personalized multiplayer gameplay experiences. 

The platform is available in 12 languages such as English, Hindi, Gujarati, Marathi, Bengali, and Bhojpuri, with over 175 million registered users. The WinZO platform facilitates over 5 billion micro-transactions per month across a portfolio of 100+ games. 

WinZO is focused on building an enthusiastic community of gamers and gaming influencers in Tier 2 – 5 cities in India. The Company envisions a future where the WinZO platform can deliver a culturally relevant and enjoyable experience in the Indian gaming ecosystem, monetized through a unique micro-transaction model.

WinZO, a series-C funded venture, has raised $100 million from Marquee gaming and entertainment investors such as Griffin Gaming partners, Courtside ventures, Maker’s fund, all of whom made their first investment in the Indian start-up ecosystem through WinZO.

name: ZOÏ Agency
about_us:
Founded in 2000 by Maria Varvarikos, ZOÏ (‘life’ in Greek) was established with the vision to help bring brands to life in creative ways. With offices in New York, Montreal and Toronto, our boutique agency offers each client full North American support and global public relations services.

Comprised of young, seasoned professionals who are passionate about their work, ZOÏ Agency’s team assumes the role of brand ambassador rather than PR representative, forming an unofficial extension of the brand’s office and one that truly understands and communicates the unique identities of our clients. It’s our personalized approach that’s allowed us to form long-term relationships with our clients and our strong network of contacts, generating impressive and measurable results for each of our brands.

With offices in New York, Montreal and Toronto, Maria and her team have been an integral part of the successful launches and branding initiatives behind top fashion, beauty, travel and lifestyle brands such as, WANT Les Essentiels, Maison Kitsuné, H&M, Tiffany & Co., COS, Garrett Leight California Optical, and more.

Motivated by the brand story above all else, ZOÏ takes pride in their unorthodox approach to public relations: Extracting the essence of the brand, highlighting their story, and communicating their uniqueness in innovative ways. Maria strongly believes that public relations efforts can only be as successful as the strategy and personal relationships they’re built on, and it’s this outlook that keeps her and her team at ZOÏ Agency deeply committed and enthusiastic in their work.

Recognized as one of Canada’s most powerful and innovative women in public relations, Natasha has been honoured with awards, including 3x Women’s Executive Network (WXN) Most Powerful Woman in Canada, Notable magazine, BizBash, and others. A sought-after speaker and commentator on public relations, business, marketing, popular culture, and fashion, Natasha is a member of the Forbes Business Council and a frequent contributor. 

Unveiled in 2021, Natasha has also collaborated with Lanterra Developments on a 47-storey high-rise namesake condominium, Natasha the Residences, inspired by her. 

Believing strongly in giving back, Natasha is the Chair of the Board of Artists for Peace and Justice in Canada and the US, and has been instrumental in raising over 32 million dollars to support the people and youth of Haiti over the last 17 years. She also supports various other charities working to improve the lives of others.

name: Pound & Grain
about_us:
Pound & Grain is a creative agency. 

We didn’t start Pound & Grain because the industry needed another agency. We started it because agencies kinda suck. 

Too many meetings. Too many decks. Too many layers between a great idea and the people who actually make it.

So we built something different. Faster. Smarter. Hungrier. With less fluff, more fire and just enough chaos to keep it interesting.

We skip the usual agency BS. Become more than just a partner. Where your challenges are our challenges. So we do what others won’t. 

Behind every great brand is a team willing to take risks, embrace boldness and do the work that sets them apart. That’s us. We’ll push, challenge and create relentlessly so you can own your category. 

We take the guts. You take the glory.

Follow us. 
Linkedin:https://www.linkedin.com/company/pound-&-grain
Instagram: instagram.com/poundandgrain/
Substack: https://poundandgrain.substack.com/about
X: http://twitter.com/PoundandGrain

We are proud member of The Society of Digital Agencies (SoDA).

name: Citral Studios
about_us: Wij geloven dat een verhaal mensen kan raken, inspireren en in beweging kan brengen. Wij staan altijd klaar om je visie tot leven te brengen en je boodschap op een heldere en aansprekende manier over te brengen, direct vanuit onze studio in het hart van Limburg. Met klanten verspreid over Limburg, Maastricht, Roermond, Eindhoven, en Heerlen zorgen wij ervoor dat je boodschap op een heldere en aansprekende wijze wordt overgebracht. Of je nu een bedrijfsfilm of video wilt laten maken, een start-up bent die zijn bedrijf wil introduceren, of een gevestigd MKB bedrijf dat zijn boodschap wil versterken, Citral Studios staat klaar om je te helpen.

name: Synima
about_us: Synima are an animation and video production for the past two decades. Based in the Amsterdam, London, New York and Los Angeles, we work globally to produce content for your brand including internal communications, commercials and social media. Our current client base includes 11 'Fortune 500' companies (J.P Morgan, Honeywell, HPE), main industry players (Activision, Aggreko, Siemens), International Organisations (European Commission, United Nations, UNICEF) and a large number of Public Relation & Advertising agencies. Our clients come back to us again and again because we genuinely care about your business. We take the time to understand your communication objectives and target audience, so we can deliver a production which reflects your brand values and the story you want to tell. We are more than a creative agency, we are your media partner.

name: Audento Digital
about_us: We Bridge an everlasting communication between our clients and their customers.

name: Gruppo Orange srl
about_us: La società nasce dall’esperienza professionale dei due fondatori, Sabrina Rossi e Andrea Fattori, che operano a vari livelli nel mondo della comunicazione dal 1990. L’attività ha inizio nel 2007, fornendo servizi e consulenze per l’editoria, e cresce rapidamente negli anni successivi, con centinaia di riviste e libri all’attivo. Gradualmente, il focus di Gruppo Orange si sposta sempre di più verso il digitale e verso la comunicazione aziendale, arrivando nel 2014 al distacco finale dal mondo dell’editoria, per dedicarsi completamente al digital marketing e ai servizi. Grazie a una vasta rete di partner e collaboratori di alto profilo, Gruppo Orange è oggi in grado di soddisfare qualsiasi esigenza di comunicazione e marketing di tutte le aziende, di qualsiasi dimensione e categoria.

name: Qiva Media
about_us: We create authentic, cinematic videos that blend the best of Nordic and Thai cultures. Based in Thailand, we’re trusted by global organisations and known for our attention to detail. For us, seamless communication and detailed planning are at the heart of every successful video.

name: MOTIK
about_us: Als full-service agency geloven wij in het omarmen van ontwikkelingen en trends. We dagen elkaar en onze klanten elke dag uit om te blijven vernieuwen, om zo verhalen te kunnen vertellen die blijven hangen. Kan niet bestaat pas als iets buiten je vermogen ligt.  In een tijd waarin de aandacht van een consument goud waard is, zien wij het als onze taak om ervoor te zorgen dat deze aandacht vastgehouden wordt. Dit doen we met opvallende campagnes die blijven hangen.    We doen er alles aan om jouw verhalen op de meest passende manier te vertellen. Hierbij zorgen we ervoor dat de gehele campagne op ieder vlak een wow-effect geeft en tegelijkertijd 100% aansluit met het beoogde resultaat.   No matter what, we bijten ons er in vast en zorgen er voor dat we jouw verhaal vertellen op een wijze dat niet eerder vertoond is en dat jij niet voor mogelijk hield.  Zo inspireren wij jou, zodat jij anderen weer kan inspireren.

name: Animation Agency
about_us: Met onze inspirerende geanimeerde content zetten wij een pakkend verhaal neer. Hiermee raken wij jouw doelgroep. Verhalen blijven bij, ze inspireren en maken dat mensen met elkaar verhalen delen. En dat is precies wat je wilt: je doelgroep moet over je praten. Dankzij het verhaal dat jij ze meegeeft, raken ze geïnformeerd, geïnspireerd, geëntertaind en ga zo maar door. Creatieve en duidelijke animaties Wij creëren inspirerende bewegende video content en verbluffende animaties voor alle online platformen. Ons doel: het maken van blijvende indrukken, het creëren van emotionele connecties en het uitleggen van jouw product of dienst. De kracht van animatiebedrijf Animation Agency: Altijd maatwerk en oneindig veel mogelijkheden.  Persoonlijke aandacht en service. Betrokken, meedenken en eerlijk advies. Animatie met visuals van zeer hoge kwaliteit.  Wij werken voor A-merken Een jong, creatief en gedreven animatiebedrijf.

name: Sherpa Marketing Agency
about_us: SHERPA Marketing Agency somos una agencia especializada en estrategias digitales omnicanal y marketing de resultados. Con un enfoque centrado en el Marketing Ético y Real, ayudamos a empresas a potenciar su presencia digital, atraer clientes de alto valor y maximizar su rentabilidad online. En SHERPA Marketing, entendemos que el marketing digital va más allá de simples anuncios o publicaciones en redes sociales. Nuestro equipo de expertos diseña estrategias personalizadas que combinan Publicidad Online, SEO, Marketing de Contenidos, Redes Sociales, Email Marketing y Diseño Web, creando ecosistemas digitales eficientes y rentables. NUESTROS SERVICIOS Publicidad Online que genera conversión: diseñamos campañas de alto rendimiento en Google, Meta, TikTok y LinkedIn Ads, asegurando el máximo retorno de inversión (ROAS). SEO que te hace visible donde importa: desde SEO técnico hasta estrategias de Linkbuilding y SEO Local, ayudamos a que tu negocio destace en los motores de búsqueda. Marketing de Contenidos y Email Marketing: creamos contenidos estratégicos y automatizaciones que convierten tráfico en clientes fieles. Diseño y Desarrollo Web optimizado: páginas web funcionales, rápidas y centradas en la conversión. Estrategias omnicanal con visión de negocio: unimos cada pieza del marketing digital para potenciar el crecimiento de nuestros clientes. QUÉ NOS DIFERENCIA En SHERPA Marketing Agency, no creemos en tácticas vacías ni en soluciones genéricas. Cada estrategia está diseñada a medida, alineada con tus objetivos de negocio y basada en datos, asegurando un enfoque transparente, sostenible y medible. ⭐ Método Sherpa: la ruta estratégica hacia la cima⭐ Como los auténticos sherpas en la montaña, te acompañamos en cada etapa de tu crecimiento digital a través de nuestra metodología propia: Exploración : analizamos tu mercado, tu competencia y las oportunidades reales. Reconocimiento : definimos la mejor estrategia para alcanzar tus objetivos de negocio. Ascenso : ejecutamos campañas y acciones digitales con precisión y optimización constante. Escalada continua : medimos, ajustamos y escalamos los resultados para garantizar un crecimiento sostenido. Si buscas una agencia que no solo ejecute tareas, sino que sea tu partner estratégico en el crecimiento digital de tu empresa, SHERPA es tu mejor aliado. ¡Empecemos a escalar juntos tu negocio! SHERPA MARKETING AGENCY Tu Negocio en la Cima

Of je nu groot bent of nog klein, je ambitie om te groeien en je bereidheid om in alle openheid samen te werken zullen bepalen of we de juiste match zijn. name: rock&stars digital

name: Snow-Stories
about_us: Snow stories est une agence de storytelling et de production spécialisée dans les sports, l’art de vivre et les films d'entreprise. Nous aidons les marques et les entreprises à créer des liens durables avec leurs clients en valorisant leur notoriété et leur identité via un storytelling authentique, plus désirable, plus remarquable, plus pertinent. Notre expertise est double et complémentaire. Nous créons du contenu de marque à forte valeur narrative mais aussi des documentaires immersifs. Tout l’art de notre narration réside dans la création d’une histoire captivante qui vous ressemble. Et comme votre histoire est unique, nos récits le sont aussi. Nos récits, profondément humains, fictifs ou réels sont emprunts de sincérité, de passions et d’émotions.

name: Kakkoï Studio
about_us: KAKKOÏ STUDIO | Studio de création digitale depuis 2009. Chez Kakkoï Studio, nous croyons fermement que chaque interaction, chaque conception et chaque campagne doit refléter la véritable essence de celles et ceux pour qui elles sont créées. Ce qui distingue Kakkoï Studio, c'est notre engagement envers les relations humaines. Nous croyons que chaque entreprise a une histoire unique à raconter, et nous sommes ici pour vous aider à la partager de manière authentique. Notre équipe est votre partenaire dévoué, prêt à comprendre vos aspirations et à les traduire en résultats tangibles. Chez Kakkoï Studio, nous sommes bien plus qu'un studio de création digital. Nous sommes vos partenaires créatifs, prêts à transformer vos idées en réalité, n'ayant qu'un simple objectif en tête : répondre à vos attentes tout en batissant une relation saine et long-termiste. Notre engagement envers nos clients va bien au-delà de la simple prestation de services. Nous nous dévouons à comprendre profondément vos besoins, aspirations et valeurs. Chaque projet est une collaboration authentique où votre vision devient notre mission. Nous nous engageons à offrir une créativité exceptionnelle, une communication transparente et des résultats tangibles. Avec Studio Kakkoï, vous avez un partenaire fidèle et passionné, dédié à transformer vos idées en réalités impressionnantes et durables. Notre succès est mesuré par votre satisfaction et la qualité des relations que nous bâtissons ensemble. EXPERTISES Stratégie / Création Marketing Digital : Site Corporate - Site Institutionnel - Plateforme Applicative et Métier - UX Design - Site Evènementiel - Performance - E-commerce - Outil Reporting BI, Data... Marketing de Contenu : Branding - Storytelling - Vidéo (Promotion, Engagement, Pédagogie, Sensibilisation, Interview, Motion Design, etc...) - Infographie Interactive - Infographie Statique - Emailing. Engagement Client : Programme de fidélité - CRM - Campagne d'Activation. Marketing Interne : Campagne Communication Interne - Incentive / Challenge - Activation Force de vente - Marque employeur - onBoarding. name: Maddon Advertisign S.L.
about_us: Maddon fue creada por Ángel González en 2014 en Donostia. Ángel ha sido Vicepresidente Creativo de HAVAS, el mayor grupo de comunicación del mundo y Director Creativo en agencias norteamericanas como Ogilvy & Mother o Foote, Cone & Belding entre otras. Trabaja en marketing y publicidad desde el año 1981. Fue uno de los primeros Directores Creativos interesados en el desarrollo de proyectos digitales para grandes clientes, cuando lo digital aún se consideraba una pequeña parte del «Below the line». Además, es un especialista en publicidad turística, y autor de muchas de la más conocidas campañas de destinos turísticos (Euskadi, Castilla y León y Andalucía entre otras). Dirige el blog Publicidad y Turismo y organizó los premios PYT Awards que se otorgaban a las mejores campañas turísticas durante tres ediciones. En este sector también ha sido pionero en la desviación de los grandes presupuestos de promoción turística hacia el mundo digital y creador de una de las primeras plataformas colaborativas digitales para Comunidades Autónomas y otros destinos turísticos. Premiado en numerosos festivales, fue el primer español en conseguir un león en el festival de Cannes para una marca de cerveza: Guinnes (en un apartado históricamente reservado para las agencias anglosajonas). Ha trabajado para prácticamente todas las grandes marcas de este país y es conferenciante y ponente en numeroso foros.

Wir verfolgen langfristige Ziele und wollen gemeinsam mit unseren Kunden*innen ein positives Momentum erzeugen. Lasst uns einander kennenlernen!

También gestionamos tus redes sociales y ofrecemos mantenimiento técnico para que tu web esté siempre al día.

name: Seed Media Agency
about_us: Seed Media Agency è l'Agenzia Giusta. Dal 2012 offriamo servizi di Social Media Marketing e Web Design. Utilizziamo gli strumenti del marketing online per promuovere le attività e le storie dei nostri clienti sui principali social media. Per farlo creiamo contenuti originali , pensati e realizzati ad hoc per ogni singolo progetto. Poi, grazie agli strumenti di advertising di Facebook e Instagram , diamo valore ai contenuti che creiamo, raggiungendo il maggior numero di persone in target con gli obiettivi che ci siamo prefissati. Grazie al Marketing Automation e all' AI , siamo in grado di automatizzare i processi di marketing e le implementazioni AI come Chatbot e Virtual Assistant porteranno il tuo progetto nel futuro ! Ti offriamo anche la possibilità di realizzare insieme il tuo nuovo sito o di rifare quello che già hai: grazie ai servizi di Web Design personalizzati possiamo disegnare il sito vetrina o e-commerce che desideri ed aiutarti a vendere online o a far conoscere la tua attività.

name: Flan Caramel
about_us: Je verkoop boosten, helder uitleggen wat je product doet of misschien wel in een notendop je bedrijf voorstellen? Bij Flan Caramel hebben we het ideale recept voor jouw business. Originele video animaties die scoren bij je doelgroep en aanzetten tot actie. Van concept tot verspreiding: wij zorgen voor een kickass resultaat! --- Augmentez vos ventes, expliquez clairement ce que fait votre produit ou présentez votre entreprise en quelques mots? Chez Flan Caramel, nous avons la recette idéale pour votre entreprise. Des animations vidéo originales qui marquent avec votre groupe cible et encouragent l'action. Du concept à la distribution: nous garantissons un résultat d'exception! --- Flan Caramel offers animation video and online video marketing for your corporate film. This can be standard as well as customized with an eye for your company message. Video animation is the kind of video that can convey every message in a suitable way. The use of animation within your communication ensures that you can easily and clearly convey your message to the customer. With animation it is also possible to appear fresh and dynamic, so you can communicate with more impact. We ensure that you get the most out of your animation video to achieve the desired result. --- Hoe gaan we te werk? Vanuit de Flan Caramel starten we steeds met een persoonlijk gesprek bij de klant. Daarin bespreken we hoe onze diensten op maat worden aangeboden en vanuit welke stijl en scenario we starten. Daarbij is een duidelijke bepaling van de boodschap en doelgroep heel belangrijk. Hierna gaat het animatieteam aan de slag om het storyboard te ontwerpen. Wanneer dat volledig is uitgewerkt, wordt het filmpje samen met de klant overlopen. Vervolgens starten we met grafisch design, waarbij vormen en figuren worden uitgewerkt. Éénmaal dit de goeie richting uit gaat, brengen we de animatie tot leven via de motion design. Afwerken doen we met de nodige geluidseffecten (Audio Design) en waar nodig correcties toe te voegen. Hierna is het van essentieel belang dat je video zo veel mogelijk wordt bekeken. Daarom biedt Flan Caramel ook advies aan op vlak van video marketing, hoe je filmpje zo veel mogelijk mensen kan bereiken. --- Comment procédons-nous? Depuis le Flan Caramel, nous commençons toujours par une conversation personnelle avec le client. Nous discutons de la façon dont nos services sont offerts pour mesurer et de quel style et scénario nous commençons. De plus, une détermination claire du message et du groupe cible est très importante. Après cela, l'équipe d'animation se met au travail pour concevoir le storyboard. Quand cela aura été complètement terminé, le film se terminera avec le client. Ensuite, nous commençons avec le design graphique, où les formes et les figures sont élaborées. Une fois que cela va dans la bonne direction, nous donnons vie à l'animation via la motion design. Nous finissons avec les effets sonores nécessaires (Conception Audio) et ajoutons des corrections si nécessaire. Après cela, il est essentiel que votre vidéo soit regardée autant que possible. C'est pourquoi Flan Caramel offre également des conseils dans le domaine du marketing vidéo, comment vous pouvez atteindre le plus de gens possible.  --- How we work? From the Flan Caramel we always start with a personal conversation with the customer. We discuss how our services are offered to measure and from which style and scenario we start. In addition, a clear determination of the message and target group is very important. After this, the animation team goes to work to design the storyboard. When that has been fully worked out, the film will run over with the customer. Then we start with graphic design, where shapes and figures are worked out. Once this goes in the right direction, we bring the animation to life via the motion design. We finish with the necessary sound effects (Audio Design) and add corrections where necessary. After this, it is essential that your video is watched as much as possible. That is why Flan Caramel also offers advice in the field of video marketing, how you can reach as many people as possible.

name: Hub Media Group | HMG
about_us: Hub Media Group (HMG) è un'agenzia digitale innovativa che unisce creatività, strategia e tecnologia per far crescere brand e aziende attraverso soluzioni di marketing efficaci e personalizzate. Chi siamo In Hub Media Group crediamo che ogni brand abbia una storia unica da raccontare e un potenziale da esprimere. Il nostro team multidisciplinare lavora in modo integrato per tradurre idee in risultati concreti, curando ogni fase del progetto con passione, dalla strategia iniziale fino alla distribuzione finale e all'analisi approfondita dei risultati. Advertising & Campagne Pubblicitarie Pianifichiamo e gestiamo campagne pubblicitarie su misura, orientate ai risultati, per garantire la massima visibilità e il miglior ritorno sull’investimento. La nostra mission Essere il partner strategico che trasforma la visione dei nostri clienti in successi misurabili, costruendo relazioni solide basate su fiducia, trasparenza e collaborazione continua. Perché scegliere HMG? Esperienza comprovata Numerosi progetti di successo realizzati per aziende di ogni settore e dimensione. Soluzioni su misura Ogni strategia è progettata specificamente per rispondere alle esigenze uniche del cliente. Innovazione continua Utilizziamo strumenti e tecnologie all’avanguardia per restare sempre un passo avanti nel mercato. Team di esperti dedicato Un team dinamico, competente e motivato che lavora al tuo fianco per raggiungere e superare i tuoi obiettivi. Con Hub Media Group, il tuo successo è la nostra priorità assoluta.

name: Iconic Vision

PRODUCTORA AUDIOVISUAL Con una innovadora metodología y recursos técnicos de calidad, nuestro equipo creativo cuenta con todo lo necesario para maximizar cualquier producción y ofrecer soluciones estratégicas que conecten a nuestros clientes con su audiencia como nunca.

name: TEAM LEWIS
about_us: TEAM LEWIS is een wereldwijd geïntegreerd communicatiebureau dat PR-, marketing- en digitale diensten levert om merken te helpen hun bedrijfsdoelen te bereiken. Met een aanwezigheid in belangrijke markten wereldwijd, combineren we lokale expertise met een mondiale reikwijdte om impactvolle, strategische campagnes te creëren. Onze toegewijde teams van experts zijn gepassioneerd over storytelling, creativiteit en innovatie, en zorgen ervoor dat onze klanten opvallen in een drukke markt. Bij TEAM LEWIS geloven we in het verleggen van grenzen en het behalen van meetbare resultaten voor onze klanten. We hebben twee vestigingen in België, in Brussel en Antwerpen, en spreken Engels, Nederlands en Frans. Wereldwijd hebben we 26 kantoren en meer dan 700 medewerkers. HOE WERKEN WIJ? Bij TEAM LEWIS werken we nauw samen met onze klanten om hun unieke behoeften en doelstellingen te begrijpen. Ons proces bestaat uit verschillende stappen: Strategieontwikkeling: We beginnen met een grondige analyse van de markt, concurrenten en doelgroep. Op basis hiervan ontwikkelen we een op maat gemaakte strategie die past bij de doelen van onze klanten. Creatieve Concepten: Onze creatieve teams brainstormen en ontwikkelen innovatieve concepten die resoneren met de doelgroep en de merkboodschap versterken. Uitvoering: We zetten onze plannen om in actie door middel van diverse communicatiekanalen zoals PR, social media, contentmarketing en digitale campagnes. Meten en Optimaliseren: We monitoren voortdurend de resultaten van onze campagnes en optimaliseren ze waar nodig om de best mogelijke resultaten te behalen. We gebruiken data-analyse om de effectiviteit te meten en waardevolle inzichten te verkrijgen. Samenwerking: We geloven in transparante communicatie en werken nauw samen met onze klanten gedurende het hele proces. We houden regelmatig overleg om voortgang te bespreken en strategieën aan te passen op basis van feedback en resultaten. Bij TEAM LEWIS streven we ernaar om duurzame relaties met onze klanten op te bouwen en hen te helpen hun volledige potentieel te bereiken door middel van effectieve en creatieve communicatieoplossingen. WAT WIJ DOEN: Bij TEAM LEWIS bieden we een breed scala aan diensten om onze klanten te ondersteunen: Public Relations: Versterk uw merk en bereik een groter publiek door middel van strategische PR-campagnes. Influencer Marketing: Werk samen met invloedrijke personen om uw merk op authentieke wijze te promoten. SEO: Verhoog uw zichtbaarheid in zoekmachines door middel van effectieve zoekmachineoptimalisatie. Paid Search: Maximaliseer uw ROI met gerichte betaalde zoekcampagnes. Social Media Marketing: Versterk uw aanwezigheid op sociale media en engageer uw doelgroep met strategische campagnes. Digital Marketing: Ontwikkel en implementeer effectieve marketingstrategieën die uw bedrijfsdoelen ondersteunen. Digitale Diensten: Optimaliseer uw online aanwezigheid met onze uitgebreide digitale marketingoplossingen. Contentcreatie: Creëer boeiende content die uw doelgroep aanspreekt en uw merkboodschap versterkt. Crisiscommunicatie: Bescherm uw merk door proactieve en reactieve crisiscommunicatiestrategieën. **** FR: À PROPOS DE NOUS TEAM LEWIS est une agence de communication intégrée mondiale qui offre des services de relations publiques, de marketing et de services numériques pour aider les marques à atteindre leurs objectifs commerciaux. Présents sur les principaux marchés mondiaux, nous combinons une expertise locale avec une portée mondiale pour créer des campagnes stratégiques et percutantes. Nos équipes dédiées d'experts sont passionnées par le storytelling, la créativité et l'innovation, et s'assurent que nos clients se démarquent sur un marché saturé. Chez TEAM LEWIS, nous croyons en la prise de risque et l'obtention de résultats mesurables pour nos clients. Nous avons deux bureaux en Belgique, à Bruxelles et Anvers, et nous parlons anglais, néerlandais et français. À l'échelle mondiale, nous avons 26 bureaux et plus de 700 employés. COMMENT NOUS TRAVAILLONS Chez TEAM LEWIS, nous collaborons étroitement avec nos clients pour comprendre leurs besoins et objectifs uniques. Notre processus se compose de plusieurs étapes : Développement de Stratégie : Nous commençons par une analyse approfondie du marché, des concurrents et du public cible. Sur cette base, nous développons une stratégie sur mesure adaptée aux objectifs de nos clients. Concepts Créatifs : Nos équipes créatives brainstorment et développent des concepts innovants qui résonnent avec le public cible et renforcent le message de la marque. Exécution : Nous mettons nos plans en action à travers divers canaux de communication tels que les relations publiques, les médias sociaux, le marketing de contenu et les campagnes numériques. Mesure et Optimisation : Nous surveillons en permanence les résultats de nos campagnes et les optimisons si nécessaire pour obtenir les meilleurs résultats possibles. Nous utilisons l'analyse des données pour mesurer l'efficacité et obtenir des informations précieuses. Collaboration : Nous croyons en une communication transparente et travaillons en étroite collaboration avec nos clients tout au long du processus. Nous tenons des réunions régulières pour discuter des progrès et ajuster les stratégies en fonction des retours et des résultats. Chez TEAM LEWIS, nous nous efforçons de bâtir des relations durables avec nos clients et de les aider à atteindre leur plein potentiel grâce à des solutions de communication efficaces et créatives. CE QUE NOUS FAISONS Chez TEAM LEWIS, nous offrons une large gamme de services pour soutenir nos clients : Relations Publiques : Renforcez votre marque et atteignez un public plus large grâce à des campagnes de relations publiques stratégiques. Marketing d'Influence : Collaborez avec des personnes influentes pour promouvoir votre marque de manière authentique. SEO : Augmentez votre visibilité sur les moteurs de recherche grâce à une optimisation efficace des moteurs de recherche. Recherche Payante : Maximisez votre retour sur investissement avec des campagnes de recherche payante ciblées. Marketing sur les Médias Sociaux : Renforcez votre présence sur les réseaux sociaux et engagez votre public avec des campagnes stratégiques. Marketing Digital : Développez et mettez en œuvre des stratégies marketing efficaces qui soutiennent vos objectifs commerciaux. Services Numériques : Optimisez votre présence en ligne avec nos solutions complètes de marketing numérique. Création de Contenu : Créez un contenu engageant qui attire votre public cible et renforce votre message de marque. Communication de Crise : Protégez votre marque grâce à des stratégies de communication de crise proactives et réactives.

name: Sixeleven
about_us: Siamo una digital creative agency Fondata a Torino alla fine del 2009, sixeleven nasce come l’unione di due agenzie che si occupavano rispettivamente di Web e Grafica. Oggi ci definiamo una digital creative agency, che realizza strategie e progetti di comunicazione e marketing per strutturare al meglio il percorso di crescita di un brand. Dalle prime fasi di analisi, pianificazione, definizione delle strategie ed elaborazione del concept, fino all'implementazione e allo sviluppo operativo della strategia e dei suoi prodotti, supportiamo e tuteliamo il cliente, lavorando in stretta collaborazione e adottando un approccio consulenziale e orientato al problem solving . Benefit Da novembre 2023, siamo diventati formalmente Società Benefit, consolidando i nostri obiettivi aziendali nell’ottica della responsabilità sociale, della trasparenza e della sostenibilità in tutte le sue forme. Il nostro obiettivo è continuare a rendere Sixeleven un luogo sicuro e accogliente per chi ci lavora, ma anche aprirci ulteriormente all’esterno con azioni che abbiano una ricaduta positiva sul territorio e le persone che lo abitano. Punti di forza Lean e Agile production Siamo un'agenzia indipendente e di medie dimensioni che offre una struttura organizzata con competenze dettagliate e verticali. Proponiamo soluzioni per facilitare il flusso di lavoro del progetto attraverso modelli snelli e agili, funzionali per una rapida risoluzione delle attività. Approccio orientato alla soluzione dei problemi Ogni progetto per noi è un percorso di crescita basato sulla collaborazione. Ascoltare attentamente le esigenze del cliente e analizzarle rappresenta il primo passo fondamentale della nostra metodologia, seguito dalla creazione di un piano condiviso, basato sulla trasparenza in ogni singola fase del processo. Visione integrata Il nostro core business risiede nella creazione di progetti con una comunicazione coordinata, dalla concezione del concept alla scelta della strategia più adatta per divulgarlo, fino alla declinazione su ogni canale di comunicazione che meglio si adatta alla strategia, al fine di ottenere i migliori risultati possibili dal progetto. STRATEGY Brand strategy / Communication strategy / Content strategy / Social media strategy / Data strategy BRANDING Logo design / Visual Identity / Naming / Content book CONTENT Editorial plan / Social media content / Digital adv / SEO & Search DIGITAL UX design / UI design / Front & Back end GRAPHICS Print / Digital / Events VIDEO & EVENTS Animations / Shooting and direction / Events direction / Virtual events

name: Simple Web Solutions
about_us: Since 2011, Simple Web Solutions has been a leading name in digital marketing, worldwide. Egal, ob es um internationale Kommunikation oder Mitarbeiterschulungen geht – wir präsentieren Inhalte klar, emotional und einprägsam. Porque sabemos que solo así podemos generar un impacto real en cada proyecto. Nos dedicamos a asesorar, crear, planificar y ejecutar estrategias de comunicación que realmente marquen la diferencia. Nos involucramos al máximo en cada proyecto, ofreciendo un trato cercano y personalizado, siempre en busca de soluciones creativas y efectivas que se adapten a las necesidades de cada cliente. Evolucionamos con los tiempos, incorporando las nuevas tecnologías y tendencias del sector para garantizar resultados óptimos. No nos encasillamos en un solo medio o canal. Analizamos y elegimos las mejores plataformas y soportes, combinando herramientas tradicionales con digitales, para asegurar que tu marca, producto o servicio tenga la mayor visibilidad posible. Fair Play Comunicación es más que una agencia. Somos tu compañero de viaje en el mundo de la comunicación, trabajando codo a codo contigo para que alcances tus objetivos.

name: Fuego Yámana

Tenemos experiencia en liderar y ejecutar ideas con un pensamiento orientado a los usuarios y las necesidades reales de cada marca , dominando las distintas herramientas y formas de comunicación. La naturaleza circundante nos inspira. Es parte de nuestra esencia, motivándonos a contemplar, cuestionarnos y usar la imaginación para enfocar nuestro pensamiento y así llegar a las mejores propuestas. ---- 🇬🇧 We are a multidisciplinary creative agency that transforms companies and organizations using the power of communication and digital tools. We produce in an integrated manner and draw from specialized professionals in each area of work, relying on the belief that dialogue, reflection, and collaborative effort can create new opportunities and enhance results. Kom eens langs voor een vrijblijvend gesprek (of een heerlijke koffie uit de coffee corner).

name: studio vibe
about_us: Wij zijn Studio vibe. The new breed of creatives. Wij zijn verliefd op het creëren van vernieuwende merken. Dit doen we met passie, talent en ambitie. Positiviteit , vriendschap en vrijheid. Noem hoe je het wilt, wij noemen het onze ‘ vibe ’. Bij vibe doen we meer dan verwacht. We weten hoe we de perfecte mix van strategie, technologie, productie en creativiteit kunnen samenstellen om waarde te creëren voor jouw merk. Klanten zijn partners. We zouden er niet zijn zonder hen. Vertrouwen is voor ons daarom erg belangrijk. Een jonge groep digitale genieën geeft om uw project. We hebben geen sales team. We doen gewoon geweldig werk. Onze blik is fris en nuchter . No-nonsense, gewoon vette designs, branding, video & animatie. Het woord ‘vibe’ komt oorspronkelijk voort uit het engelse woord ‘vibration’ wat staat voor 'trilling'. Wat voor soort trillingen? Alles en iedereen trilt. Miljarden trillingen zijn verspreid over het hele universum. Deze trillingen zijn te verstaan, te voelen en over te brengen, maar ze zijn niet direct zichtbaar voor het menselijke oog. Het is bij ons van belang om onze ‘vibe’ aan iedereen door te geven en deze ook zo goed mogelijk uit te dragen. Daarom hebben we een aantal specifieke trillingen visueel zichtbaar gemaakt om te gebruiken als huisstijl-elementen. We hebben onder andere gewerkt voor: JBL, Univé, DJI, Insta 360, Harman/Kardon, Snelle, Grohe, Legamaster, Saxion Hogescholen, AT bookings, Don’t waste culture, Topicus, Traffic Today, Anne-Marie Wonen Holten, RIHO, By Sidde, Gemeente Rijssen-Holten. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- English below We are Studio vibe. The new breed of creatives. We are in love with creating innovative brands. We do this with passion, talent and ambition. Positivity , friendship and freedom. Call it what you will, we call it our 'vibe'. At vibe, we do more than expected. We know how to put together the perfect mix of strategy, technology, production and creativity to create value for your brand. Customers are partners. We wouldn't be here without them. Trust is therefore very important to us. A young group of digital geniuses care about your project. We don't have a sales team. We just do great work. Our view is fresh and down-to-earth . No-nonsense, just kickass designs, branding, video & animation. The word "vibe" originally comes from the word "vibration". What kind of vibration? Everything and everyone vibrates. Billions of vibrations are spread throughout the universe. These vibrations can be understood, felt and transmitted, but they are not immediately visible to the human eye. It is important for us to pass on our 'vibe' to everyone and to transmit it in the best possible way. Therefore, we have made a number of specific vibrations visually to use as corporate identity elements. We have worked for: JBL, Univé, DJI, Insta 360, Harman/Kardon, Snelle, Grohe, Legamaster, Saxion Hogescholen, AT bookings, Don't waste culture, Topicus, Traffic Today, Anne-Marie Wonen Holten, RIHO, By Sidde, Gemeente Rijssen-Holten.

name: JUNGMUT
about_us: Mit maßgeschneiderten digitalen Lösungen unterstützen wir Organisationen dabei, ihre Ziele eigenständig zu erreichen und nachhaltigen Erfolg zu sichern. Gemeinsam entwickeln wir Strategien, die Botschaften klar, wirkungsvoll und auf den Punkt bringen – für eine starke, konsistente und zukunftsorientierte digitale Präsenz. Wir verbinden das kreative Denken und die Energie der Digital Natives mit fundierter Erfahrung aus über 15 Jahren Digitalarbeit. So erschließen wir gemeinsam mit unseren Kund:innen neue Potenziale – strategisch klug, gestalterisch kraftvoll und technisch präzise. Unsere Zusammenarbeit ist geprägt von Offenheit, Partnerschaftlichkeit und echter Umsetzungsstärke. Ob als langfristiger Sparringspartner, flexibler Support im Alltag oder strategischer Impulsgeber: Wir liefern Lösungen, die wirklich passen – und teilen unser Wissen gern als Speaker:innen auf Fachveranstaltungen oder in Workshops. Unsere Leistungen Websites Wir konzipieren und realisieren Websites, die begeistern – funktional, nutzerzentriert und visuell überzeugend. Dabei denken wir Websites nicht als Projekt, sondern als Produkt im dauerhaften Wandel. Gemeinsam mit unseren Kund:innen schaffen wir zentrale digitale Touchpoints, die flexibel wachsen und langfristig relevant bleiben. Unser technisches Know-how reicht von TYPO3 und WordPress bis hin zu Headless-Ansätzen – immer mit Fokus auf Barrierearmut, SEO und Nutzerführung. Inbound Marketing & Marketing Automation Wir setzen auf eine datengetriebene Kommunikation, die Menschen im richtigen Moment erreicht. Durch gezieltes Inbound Marketing schaffen wir Inhalte, die nicht nur informieren, sondern konvertieren – entlang der gesamten Customer Journey. Unsere Strategien umfassen Content-Erstellung, SEO, Leadgenerierung, E-Mail-Marketing, Social Media sowie die Automatisierung von Marketingprozessen mit Tools wie ActiveCampaign oder HubSpot – alles mit dem Ziel, nachhaltige Kundenbeziehungen aufzubauen. Daily Marketing Support Wir unterstützen interne Teams mit zuverlässigem, agilem Marketing-Support im Tagesgeschäft – hands-on, flexibel und effizient. Ob Social Media, Newsletter, Performance-Kampagnen oder Contentpflege: Wir agieren als verlängerter Arm des Marketingteams und schaffen spürbare Entlastung. Mit klaren Prozessen, festen Ansprechpartner:innen und einem hohen Anspruch an Qualität sorgen wir dafür, dass Ideen nicht in der Pipeline stecken bleiben, sondern wirklich sichtbar werden. Positionierung & Design Eine starke Marke braucht Klarheit – inhaltlich wie visuell. Wir helfen Unternehmen dabei, ihre Identität zu schärfen, ihre Werte präzise zu kommunizieren und ein Erscheinungsbild zu entwickeln, das sich einprägt. Von der Markenstrategie über Corporate Design bis hin zu UI/UX und Content-Guidelines schaffen wir eine unverwechselbare Basis, die über alle Kanäle hinweg wirkt – relevant für Kund:innen, Partner:innen und Mitarbeitende gleichermaßen. Mit JUNGMUT an deiner Seite erhältst du maßgeschneiderte Lösungen, die dir helfen, deine digitalen Ziele zu erreichen und nachhaltigen Erfolg zu sichern.

name: Letter to Memphis
about_us: À propos de nous : Créée en 2010 par un ancien avocat, Letter to Memphis est une agence de production audiovisuelle installée à Lyon et Paris. Nous réalisons des films documentaires pour les métiers du droit, de l’artisanat, des arts et du patrimoine — des films portés par celles et ceux qui incarnent ces savoir-faire au quotidien. Notre approche est directe, sensible, fidèle à ce qui se joue sur le terrain. Notre raison d'être : Nous filmons ceux qui font. Nous racontons ce qui les anime. Notre mission : Révéler l’humain derrière chaque savoir-faire Les histoires comme moteur du changement Les récits ont une force unique : ils permettent de voir le monde autrement, de ressentir, de comprendre et d’agir. Une histoire bien racontée ne se contente pas de transmettre un message : elle influence les perceptions, donne du sens à l’action et engage durablement son audience. Dans le droit comme dans les métiers d’art, chaque geste, chaque parole porte une histoire — nous la rendons visible. L’humain au cœur de l’expertise Derrière chaque cabinet d’avocats, chaque atelier, chaque entreprise, il y a des individus, des engagements et des héritages. Notre approche vise à révéler ces dimensions humaines, souvent invisibles, qui donnent de la profondeur aux métiers. En valorisant la précision d’un juriste, la passion d’un artisan ou la transmission d’un savoir ancestral, nous dépassons la simple communication institutionnelle pour créer une identité forte, sincère et mémorable. Une approche visuelle et émotionnelle Un film ne se limite pas à de belles images. Ce qui compte, c’est l’accord entre ce qu’on montre et ce qu’on raconte. Nous cherchons l’équilibre entre clarté du propos, justesse du ton et exigence esthétique. Ce mélange donne aux récits leur intensité et leur portée, qu’il s’agisse d’expliquer une réforme juridique ou de faire sentir la chaleur d’un atelier. Donner de la portée à ce qu’on raconte Qu’il s’agisse de faire comprendre un cadre légal complexe ou de transmettre la beauté d’un geste artisanal, un film peut faire écho à une expérience vécue, éveiller une émotion ou simplement rendre une parole plus audible. Notre travail consiste à créer ce lien : entre ce qui est dit, et ce que l’on retient. Entre le savoir-faire et le faire-savoir.

name: Unikvideo
about_us: En 2023, UnikVideo est fondée par un groupe d'entrepreneurs passionnés par la création de contenu numérique pour les entreprises. En constatant le besoin croissant des entreprises pour la création de vidéos et de podcasts corporate, ils décident de lancer une agence vidéo spécialisée dans ce domaine. UnikVideo se positionne comme une agence experte en création et réalisation de vidéos et podcasts corporate pour le web et pour les réseaux sociaux. Leur équipe est composée d'experts en production vidéo et en marketing digital, qui sont en mesure de produire des vidéos de qualité professionnelle qui suscitent l'intérêt et l'engagement de leur public en ligne. UnikVideo propose un service sur-mesure et conseille ses clients pour répondre à toutes leurs attentes en matière de création de contenu vidéo. Ils comprennent l'importance de produire des vidéos qui reflètent la personnalité de chaque entreprise et qui mettent en valeur leur marque, leurs produits et leurs services. En travaillant avec UnikVideo, les entreprises peuvent booster leur content marketing en créant du contenu vidéo de qualité qui leur permet de se démarquer de la concurrence et de se connecter avec leur public en ligne. L'agence travaille avec des marques de renom pour produire des vidéos percutantes qui racontent une histoire convaincante et qui atteignent les objectifs commerciaux de leurs clients. Avec UnikVideo, les entreprises peuvent être sûres de recevoir un service professionnel et de qualité, avec une attention particulière portée à chaque étape du processus de production vidéo. Ensemble, UnikVideo et ses clients travaillent main dans la main pour produire des vidéos de qualité qui renforcent la présence en ligne de leur entreprise.

I settori in cui opera oggi con successo sono l’alta gioielleria , il food , il design , fieristico , dell’editoria , dell’arte , i matrimoni , le startup , gli e - commerce , il politico e il governativo . Come agenzia di marketing ci occupiamo dell’identificazione di strategie di business development , di produzione di contenuti per i social , di online advertising .
